title: Jen Orchardgareway
desc: Overall Hotel was fantastic! Location is very good in the middle of the hustle and bustle of Orchard Road, where there are numerous shops, restaurants and bars. Pool and Bar is spectacular on the 19th floor, boasting a panoramic views of Singapore, with all different types of seating areas for all. Hotel management automatically upgraded us to a superior room when the prices fell due to the virus.

title: Really good hotel and amazing Infinity pool
desc: We have been visit here also at 2016, but now we had club room. It was good and nice service at club lounge. Pool area was also great again. Gym was clean and good size. Club room with city view was also bigger than standard room last time. Breakfast was really good at restaurant. club lounge breakfast was not so varius than restaurant. Hotel is near to metro, and it is easy to access metro or walk with orchard road area. Service was excellent.

title: Great stay - Club Deluxe recommendation
desc: Before the COVID crisis we spent some 4 wonderful nights at the Hotel Jen. Despite our flight landed really early and we arrived by 6am in the Hotel, we were offered breakfast at the Club facilities and within 1.5 hour our room was ready for check in. A truly fantastic service. We booked a Club Deluxe Room and the money was well worth it. Check-in is pretty unspectacular but friendly exclusiv at Level 19 (follow signs Deluxe Lounge). Room was big, fantastic views towards Orchard Road but yet very quiet. Breakfast was delicious an absolutely sufficient for a good start into the day (good coffee). Pool area is nicely decorated. There could be some more sunshades since the sun can be really hot. Pool views were great and the whole area never crowded. During late afternoon we were

title: Excellent Location
desc: Stayed at this hotel for a day staycation with the family just to wind down. No major complaints. The room is clean and comfortable. The bed is so nice to sleep on that I wish I do not need to get out from it. Most necessities that we require were available. No problem to the speed of the wifi. TV channels are aplenty. More importantly, the staffs attending to us during check-in and check-out were friendly, The location is excellent for those who wants to spend their time shopping considering the many major shopping centres situated within few minutes walking distance from the hotel. Oh. I love that there is this vending machine to purchase tidbits or necessities if you are lazy to get our from your hotel. For those who will be driving, do note that there is free parking. So do

title: Fantastic in every way!
desc: Hotel Jen is located right next to orchard gateway shopping centre, and has shops, restaurants and bars all around! The views from the amazing rooftop infinity pool and bar area are perfect, especially for photos of the city skyline and marina bay sands. The pool bar has a good cocktail menu, with perfect Singapore slings! Our room was lovely, each and every staff member was kind and welcoming and the buffet breakfasts were delicious! We will definitely stay at hotel Jen again and again!

title: Great Stay
desc: Spacious room with well equipped. The receptionist welcome us with a good smile. Club lounge was serving good food and drinks. Location of hotel was excellent, which link to shopping mall. Overall was a good experience.

title: Good location to explore Singapore
desc: Very nice hotel with a good location to explore Singapore. MRT Somerset directly next to the hotel. Rooms are clean, breakfast has a big selection of western and Asian food and the pool has a stunning view.

title: Top of the world Ma
desc: This hotel put Me at ease from the moment I arrived. A young man met us as we got out the taxi and took our luggage putting it on a barrow and escorting us up the lift 10 floors to reception..At reception after been given a drink the polite young lady checked us in . The room was spacious and light. Next morning we went for breakfast and was met by another very polite member of staff who took our temperatures ,checking for coved19. Breakfast was varied, catering for continental,Asian , British and America taste. The Chef came out and asked customers for feedback on how he could make the experience better. On the 19th Floor is a pool with towels provided from the bar where you can order food from a varied menu. If you order something in your room it is delivered by a droid

title: Thank you
desc: Writing this review on my mum's behalf: The staff and management were very caring and sent us handwritten messages of encouragement daily to brighten our 14-day stay (12-26 April 2020) when we just got back from overseas. The youtube messages were also a nice and sweet touch. The online activities were also greatly appreciated. The food service is on time and tasty. The bed is very comfortable too. I would like to thank all the staff for a very pleasant stay. The lobby staff during the check-in and checkout were also extremely helpful and friendly. They readily helped with my luggage. Thank you Hotel Jen Orchard Gateway and stay safe everyone!

title: Highly flexible in current Covid-19 situation
desc: Unfortunately we needed to cancel our stay in Jen Orchardgateway due to the current travel restrictions in regards to Covid-19. Despite our sadness that we needed to cancel our trip and all the influences beyond our control, the hotel managed our cancellation with a high level of flexibility and really showed a lot of goodwill to please their customers. We highly appreciate that high level of flexibility and can only further recommend the hotel for it’s professionalism and for being so customer-friendly! Thanks a lot, we will for sure plan another stay as soon as global situation allows!!!

title: Amazing stay - we didn't want to leave!
desc: We arrived on 1 1 Dec for our quarantine and I was so happy to be assigned this hotel for our 2 week stay. I'd already been to their restaurant and knew it to be a good hotel but staying here for a whole fortnight just blew my mind. They even surprised us with a massive anniversary celebration table all decked out with goodies. While their infinity pool looked amazing (we were not allowed to leave the room during our quarantine) we were more than compensated by the friendliness of the staff right from check in to the time we board our taxi home! I could not have asked for a better experience. This definitely turned out to be a highlight of my 2020!

title: Served SHN
desc: I checked out of Hotel Jen Orchard Gateway today and want to thank the staff for all their hard word. Also, I have to say, and this is because we all have different tastes, I didn’t like the food that was offered - so after a few days rather than waste it decided to stop it. The hotel then offered salads and oh my goodness they were amazing! So if you are in this hotel, and struggling with the food, speak to them and ask for fruit salad for breakfast and salads for lunch/dinner - enjoy!

title: Lovely stay
desc: Everything is awesome here, the staff, the food, the location and facilities, is amazing. You can go anywhere from, I mean everywhere, because it's located in downtown and in the famous Orchard Road and also in the top of Somerset MRT station. I recommended that you all should stay in this fantastic hotel Read less

title: Wonderful Stay At Jen Orchards gateway
desc: We are really fortunate to get Jen Orchards gateway hotel as part of Singapore SHN. Staff was very polite all thru 14days stay. Service was fantastic. Service personnel was very cooperative and helped to get whatever needed to keep the room clean as there is no cleaning services. Food was really fantastic.

title: Meant to be a celebration :(
desc: I was looking forward to a birthday celebration for my 7 year old during the school holiday. Have booked for 2 nights starting 22 Nov after reading great reviews. Unfortunately, I recieved a call on 28 Oct that the hotel stay had to be cancelled due to Stay Home Notice. I was clearly upset as it is only 3 weeks away. The customer service executive, Nikki could only say that they tried to email me on 8 October but my email bounced. I told her that there could not have been any mistake in my email address as I have had numerous correspondences with the hotel for my daughter's celebration arrangement. I was offered no viable alternatives but to cancel/ refund or to defer my stay till Feb next year which is well past the school holidays. I am appalled by the customer service

title: Great meals
desc: This hotel is right smack in the heart of Orchard Road. The room is clean and well designed. The service is warm and friendly. Meals are pretty yummy and portions are adequate. My staycation was over the Christmas period.

title: Jacuzzi pool is unsafe and needs a barrier! Club Benefits and Breakfast Below Expectations.
desc: 13-15th Feb 2022, staycation with club benefits review. This negative review is from our personal experience there and is in no way a means to attempt to get a free night. Only pluses were great location, great pool view and decent normal room. Slipped and fell on the morning of the 14th at the pool jacuzzi. With the jacuzzis running, i could not tell that it was curved (other one was angular). The no entry signs were too small to notice. Ended up with a cut toe (pool tiles were sharp) and a bump on the back of my head. I strongly encouraged the hotel to place a barrier preventing access to the jacuzzi section of the pool from the deck. I hope it is now in place in April 2022. As compared with the other 20+ hotels, 8 of them with club benefits that we have staycay'ed in

title: Bad reservation team
desc: Comfortable and clean room, breakfast is great. The reservation team did not reply my email for the booking, phone unable to reach and transfer to 3 different staffs that ask me to cancel my booking which they dint listen to my enquiry clear. Booked a club room but club lounge is closed, only have one hour drink instead of 2hrs, and only one bento box for club room evening cocktail hour.

title: Strange...
desc: I tried to email and contact their reservations department regarding my stay tomorrow but it seem impossible to get hold of anyone. I am on hold for 25 mins and noone picked up the call. Its pretty frustrating.

title: A surprise stay that was kids friendly...
desc: Booked 2 nights for a staycay with our young children in a Deluxe King. Was offered an upgrade to the Club floor, however, the room was a little dusty (but had the most amazing room view + bathtub view). Feedback to the front office the next day and Vesta (FOM) rectified it with a room switch (available a few hours later - it was ok as we were headed to the pool + lunch). The pools on level 19 were awesome - there are 3 pools (1 baby wading pool, 1 x 0.9m, 1 x 1.2m) which are children friendly and there are kids floats & life vests available for use. Loved the daily buffet breakfast option - now you are able to see and choose the items you'd like and get served on the spot. Shout out to the relatively young (looking) team, you can see they are trying their best to provide good

title: Great experience in JEN Orchardgateway
desc: We were long stay guests (total of 5 weeks) in this superb central location hotel in Singapore. Room could be bigger, but the convenience location made up for it. Hotel staff were very professional, polite and helpful. I would like to especially highlight the exceptional service provided by Ms Mavis Kiong in the breakfast restaurant. She goes above and beyond to make us feel like home! Superb service with a smile. We will be back.

title: Good for shopping around orchard road
desc: The hotel Jen Orchard Gateway is in a very good location, accessible to the shopping malls, MRT and in the middle of orchard road. Hotel staffs are friendly and helpful. Standard club room size is small and no frills. Good for 1 to 2 persons short stay and shopping. If a larger room is preferred for family stay, perhaps may consider the panorama club room.

title: Great Experience! Highly Recommend
desc: First off I want to give a big thank you to the GM and staff for making our stay at Hotel JEN Orchardgateway amazing! I never write reviews but given the excellent service and memorable experience I decided to write my first review. Was on my way to Hong Kong from Canada but since all flights were banned, I had to wash out in SG for 14 days. Booked "long stay experience." I was concerned my stay in SG would be tiresome however due to my wonderful experience at Hotel JEN Orchard the stay went by in a flash. A few things I would like to highlight about the hotel: -Convenient location, right in the heart of Orchard Road where there is a ton of places to shop and eat. Connected to mall and MRT station. -Excellent service and attention to detail from hotel staff. Some

title: Family room
desc: The family room and bathroom are spacious and has a nice view. Check-in was fast. We were able to book a slot to swim at the rooftop swimming pool. We had an enjoyable stay. Didn't give it a 5-star rating as the phone in our room wasn't working and long wait for the lift to get to the mall and from the mall back to the hotel.

title: Definitely NOT a Shangrila Hotel group of properties
desc: We made a reservation for the JEN Hotel Orchard Gateway in Singapore. The hotel seemed like a good and safe bet online. The problems started when we tried to check in. We arrived around 330pm to check in…way after the usual check in times of a hotel. As a Jade member, we normally are able to check in as early as 11am in other Shangrila hotels but obviously not at the Jen Hotel. The check in took nearly 45 minutes for two rooms. Whilst the lady helping us was friendly, it was just a painful experience checking in. When we made the booking, I had requested for connecting rooms but they had informed that none were available and they would give us side by side rooms. When we checked in, one of the rooms was not available and they wanted to give us another room away from each other.

title: Excellent stay
desc: We booked the Hero package/ club de luxe that includes breakfast, lunch and evening cocktails with one round of mini bar. Very worth it for the rate paid. Excellent service through out our stay. Room was clean and spacious. Only downside is that reservation didn't reply my email as I was inquiring on something...didn't get a reply even up to the day that we already checked out.. thought reservation team should make sure all emails are being answered or at least acknowledged. If reservations can't reply maybe it's time to remove their email addres as the default when customers need assistance with their booking or reservations. This is the only hotel in which reservation doesn't seem to care at all. Overall stay was pleasant. Thank you

title: Exception Memorable Hospitality at Jen Orchard Gateway
desc: Great service seldom gets acknowledged and exceptional experiences hardly. Jen was a discovery and a Gem of an experience. This was the equivalent of a holistic ‘out-of-this-world’ experience. The service was exceptional, staff friendly and accommodating and the premises equally tidy, clean and perfect for a long stay. The atmosphere was comfortable, relaxing and a sense of sophistication for which the GM, Allen must be commended. This was my first experience of another Shangri-La property and I think Jen sets the standard for similar products. Quite often guests see staff from a functional perspective in that they are there to serve. Hospitality staff also need feedback in the form of a ‘thank you’ and smile to keep them motivated. All the staff were incredible, friendly,

title: Lovely hotel
desc: My husband, son and I stayed at this lovely hotel and we thoroughly enjoyed our stay. Hotel was centrally located so was very convenient when going around. The staff were polite and helpful and the rooftop infinity pool breathtaking! With regard to food as I am vegetarian, I wished there were more vegetarian options on the menu however whatever I tried out were good in taste and potion size. Would definitely return when back in Singapore.

title: Incredible Stay, Staff, and Service!
desc: I was in Singapore recently for business and stayed at Hotel Jen for almost 2 weeks. The stay was very pleasant, the pool incredible, staff and service were world-class! Hotel Jen's facilities were kept clean and I felt very comfortable traveling in regards to COVID-19. I enjoyed receiving room service from Jen-o. Their super-cool robot! Be sure to check out the pool for some incredible reviews and good burgers. 5/5 would stay again!

title: Great stay even better service!
desc: I was there with my family of 7, rooms were spacious and check-in process was seamless. Thank you Christina from the front desk for helping to accommodate to our requests for the elderly! Unfortunately, my room had quite a leak overnight due to the heavy rain and had to get a room change, but overall, experience was great (had some cute chocolates for service recovery too:)). Pool view was stellar! Housekeeping services, service operation line and all was quick in their response as well. Will definitely come back!

title: Amazing pool and location.
desc: Stayed here for our first 7 days in Singapore. Had a bit of an issue at check in and the young reception charged £1500 to our credit card. This was quickly sorted the next day. Took us about 30 mins to check in due to big queues. This was hampered by an old lady playing very loudly on a public piano in reception. Not sure who's idea it was to out one there, hard enough to speak and hear through plastic screens and masks. The pool area is fabulous and world class. Bar staff are fab and really friendly. Our room on the executive floor was great and had everything you could need. Amazing breakfast and again all staff were excellent. The executive lounge was brilliant and we really enjoyed the wine and spirits and the nightly bento box of treats. Think they struggled some nights

title: A hidden "Jen" that could be better
desc: Strategic location, comfortable bed. The check-in process took longer than expected due to limited staff (only 2). I had an early breakfast for Ramadhan fasting which could be better because the food was cold. Nevertheless, it was an okay stay.

title: Birthday celebration 🍾
desc: Good stay with my love, comfortable room with excellent location. All the staffs are friendly especially Shaun from the pool bar. Overall was pretty good with a very good deal price to stay in the middle of the city area. Easy to access to MRT station or walking distance to the few malls at Orchard or Somerset. Perfect view from the rooftop swimming pool 😍

title: Great roof top pool
desc: Amazing location with a great roof top pool. Can't praise Yoseh the bat manager enough, super friendly and helpful, the hotel are lucky to have him ☺️☺️. Our room wasn't ready on arrival so we were given a complimentary breakfast which had a great selection

title: The best place to be in Singapore
desc: We were first time in Singapore and picked the Hotel out because of its Rooftop pool, not knowing exactly what to expect but I must admit, we were amazed. The Room was clean. The entire staff at the Rooftop Bar were very friendly. Breakfast options were diverse , the staff were also very friendly My special thanks to a lady called Mavis Kiong, at least I think that’s her name. She goes out of her way to make sure that you really get what you need. Thanks to her I had my chai right at breakfast and didn’t have to go all the way to Little India to have my Chai. A small gesture but made a big impact. Thanks Ms Mavis.

title: A very comfortable and happy stay
desc: Me and my family recently stayed at Hotel Jen orchardgateway for my daughter's birthday! The counter staff were very accommodating and super friendly with a big and warm smile throughout our check in process. The room had a great view with very fast and delicious room service.

title: Awesome Place!
desc: Great place to escape for short staycation. Location is superb! Right in the center of Orchard Road. Friendly staff, good selection of breakfast. Roof top pool is just awesome with great view and must try their burger! Yum!! Will definitely come back again!

title: Convenient location
desc: Great location in the heart of Orchard. The highlight was the amazing rooftop pool. Simply beautiful! The rooftop dining was however very disappointing and pales drastically in comparison to the stunning pool. A chicken burger which was advertised as crispy arrived wet and mushy and the chips that accompanied it were so bland and tasteless. Cooking can best be described as sadly amateurish.

title: One chance to make a first impression and Jen OrchardGateway fumbled it.
desc: Turning up at 19:15 after a long flight to be told my room isn’t ready is poor by any standard. Was my first visit to this hotel and quite probably my last. To be offered a drink at the bar for an unspecified amount of time or a late check out on my last day (sensing that is just moving the problem and creating issues such as mine) is not great service recovery. One chance to make a first impression and Jen OrchardGateway fumbled it. Still plenty of choice from other hotels more geared to delighting not disappointing.

title: Worst experience ever
desc: The worst day ever and it’s just the beginning of my stay here. We arrived at Hotel Jen Orchard Gateway at 4pm, went up to the hotel lobby at level 10 and proceed with check in process. Then was told our rooms aren’t ready and still in cleaning process, despite check in time being 2pm. Given complimentary drinks for Lounge Jen and so we came here to wait but turns out nobody is serving here so we can’t get drinks. And NOTE HERE, I specifically called the hotel hotline weeks before my stay to confirm my stay and told them that i have recently had a surgery and is in recovery thus coming for my follow up, thus the reason i requested for connecting rooms so my family could take care of me and rooms near lift lobby for convenience throughout our stay here. Instead of a pleasant stay

title: Best Location!
desc: Been several times staying at Jen before the COVID, and thisi s the first time again since COVID, the room was spacious when you think you're in Orchard area. Then the bed was cery comfortables, staff are nice! Which i really love is location & location! Its in Orchardgateway and next to 313 Somerset & MRT. Which is great right?! The Splash Pool was extra ordinary, one of the best infinity pool which toward to Singapore's city view.

title: Excellent hotel
desc: Excellent location, close to MRT and Orchard Road. Very nice comfortable rooms . Good food with plenty of choice. Fantastic staff who are always willing to help without being in the way. Reasonable prices for food and drink. Great views from swimming pool with plenty of room to relax

title: Fantastic staff
desc: The staff are a credit to the hotel, I did not encounter a single member of staff that was not extremely helpful and friendly. They went went out of their way to ensure a great service for all guests. I celebrated my birthday while there but did not tell anyone. However the maid noticed the cards in my room and that afternoon a balloon and chocolates with a birthday message was delivered to my room. It made my day and just goes to show the level of attention and care the staff embody. I cannot praise them enough, they made the stay memorable. Location and pool where also brilliant. Would definitely stay again!

title: a reward for service of a particular person
desc: We spent 2 weeks at the hotel and found everyboby to be very friendly and nothing was to much trouble where ever we were. In the club lounge Christina was exceptional in the way she tool care of everybody and nothing was to much trouble alway with a smile. Keeping table cleared of dirty dishes and clean tables was done very quickly ready for the next lot of people. making sure the food was presented and topped up was great to see. Christina really semed to enjoy her job being in the lounge or at reception

title: Room 1611 — your hotel Tinder catfish
desc: The room I was assigned felt like a Tinder Catfish. The reservation I made was for a Panorama Club King but it only bore a vague resemblance to the pictures posted online. Why is the advertised sofa missing? And shouldn’t the walk in wardrobe be linked to the bathroom? While I can understand that there are variances to the rooms, why do I feel like I’ve been assigned the runt of the litter? Despite the team’s assurance that ours is one of the nicer rooms (there are others with only showers or even smaller) it is hard to understand why we’re subject to a game of chance despite paying for a room in the highest category. Instead of a bathtub with a view, ours had a view of marble toilet walls. A very weird observation is that the Changing Rooms next to the pool had better

title: Absolutely wonderful!
desc: My first trip to Singapore, Hotel Jen definetly matches the awesomeness of this city. Mei checked us in and went above and beyond to make us feel welcome. Our panoramic room #1510 was stunning, clean and the pillows were heaven. The tv integrated into the bathroom mirror was a lovely unexpected addition while having a bubble bath with full window view of the city lights and M.B.Sands. The rooftop pool lives up to the best pool in the world award, it is gorgeous & spacious with fantastic views. Kandau at the bar was a gem and a true asset to the hotel. His friendlyness and assistance was unparrellel, my sincerest thank you to you Sir. Jeno the room service robot also deserves a mention, so modern and just fun! Would defo recommend this hotel very highly and will stay there

title: There is better value
desc: This hotel is extremely well located in the heart of fabulous Singapore, the staff are exceptional and the breakfast great but the rooms are small and the split elevator system is slow and frustrating. Value for money is wanting in my view and the bathroom as part of the bedroom is unusual.

title: Great location, fantastic service
desc: Be part of the city’s vibes when you swim in the rooftop pool! Staff is amazing and remembers you by your name. Also if you are dining the buffet breakfast is not too bad with variety of choices. Will be back again!

title: Calm in between the hustle & bustle
desc: Stay: 1st May to 4th May 2022 Booking: Self Review: Value for Money: Booked the Club Room (with club lounge perks) directly through mail interaction with Ms. Estelle Lim @ Sing Dollar (SGD) 330.67/- per night which is fairly on the higher side but worth it. The Club Room is on the 18th floor and had the city view Service Quality: Excellent. A welcome goodie box of snacks, wafers, pocky and juice cartons was a nice touch. Hotel staff is accommodating in every sense of the word. We had an issue with the reading light which was addressed immediately Food & Drink: The hotel has a restaurant area indoors (Makan @Jen) with a huge seating space, here you can have complimentary breakfast as per your package and it also caters to a wide palate. There is a rooftop restaurant

title: Great break away and hotel in a fab location
desc: Had a lovely break at this property which is in a fantastic location, very central and easy to get to all the main sights in Singapore The staff in the hotel were all very helpful including at check in, at the pool area, at the restaurant, etc. Did not spend a lot of time in the hotel as was out sight seeing every day, however the most time I did spend in the hotel was up at the infinity pool which is lovely. Fab views from the pool area and a great place to relax It is certainly not a cheap hotel to stay in and the food and beverages are expensive, however that is to be expected all over Singapore as it is well known as being an expensive destination. Good range of meal options available in the main restaurant and some nice options at the pool bar too, especially the

title: Superb location and amazing views from the rooftop pool!
desc: Stayed here for a 5 night trip. This hotel is superb - The pool area is amazing! It’s central and has its own access to the local trains - MRT There are so many malls attached due to the hotel being in Orchard Gateway you need time to try them all for food! Shopping too. Only a short walk takes you to Chinatown and Raffles plus Robertson Quay which is a lovely restaurant and bar area. There is a robot called Jeno that goes sound cleaning the areas which is amazing! The rooms are cleaned every day to a fantastic standard! The breakfast buffet offers a wide range of options in a nice environment.

title: Comfortable. Great location.
desc: The room has the basics and what you need for good nights sleep. Like most high density Asian cities, rooms are small but comfortable enough. Front staff very friendly. Roof top pool perfect, also great views. Excellent location, MRT right next door and also front door next to where taxi stops. Right on Orchard Road so super convenient. Price could be lower for the room type you get, we had the deluxe but still basic by western standards; not luxury but comfortable, but Singaporean hotels aren’t cheap anyways.

title: Orchard Best Choice
desc: I love this hotel. Located in the heart of Orchard area and had interconnection with the Mall, MRT, & Bus stop in opposite of the hotel gate. The room is clean and well designed. The rooftop pool was amazing with incredible view of Singapore. The food not certified as an halal food, but it’s not a problem, so for you who need to find a halal food, you might come to lots of food stand options in the Mall that right next to Hotel. Over all this hotel was great.

title: Jen Orchardgateway 2022
desc: It’s in the heart of Orchard Road being very accessible to food, transport and shopping. Hotel staff is tight but super clean. The staff here are superb and very professional. Also the breakfast spread is very sumptous making it adult and kid friendly 😍

title: Clean, compact and convenient hotel.
desc: Located at the heart of the city easy getting around the city with the direct access as to MRT (Subway). Stayed at Panorama Room, it was clean and comfortable. We loved the ambiance of the hotel and there are hidden oasis in town as it might not known by many - Outdoor Pool on the roof top. Enjoyed the breath taking scenery for Sunset. We will be back! Thanks to the great team of Jen :)

title: Non Existent Service
desc: We did not stay at this hotel. We were booked and prepaid, but our plans were disrupted by COVID. We informed the hotel via email, without the courtesy of a response. We further emailed the hotel to see if we could defer the booking as we re-arranged our travel plans. Again, no response and a week later, still no response. The accommodation? We cannot advise. The customer service and common courtesy - it does not exist. There are plenty of other hotels in Singapore!

title: Nice hotel and good location
desc: Overall Satisfied: Our family booked 07 rooms for our special occasions and have enjoyed the rooms, gym, and pool. MRT, bus stops are located nearby, so it is very convenient to travel by public transport. Unsatisfied part: 1. Our check-in process took almost an hour and the front desk staff was too slow in the check-in process. Although sometimes I was just wanting to ask a few questions because we are tourists, then I see 3-4 other guests waiting for check-in, but at that time there was only one receptionist and no one else came out to check if there were many customers is waiting or not. As the rest people were in the queue, we have no choice but to wait and this has caused a lot of frustration for us. 2. I don't know if this is "a problem" for the hotel because the

title: Great hotel
desc: We stayed at the hotel June 2022. The hotel was clean and tidy and was a great location being on top of the MRT station. Breakfast was great and had a wide selection of food. The rooftop pool was fab but does get busy so recommend getting there before midday.

title: Good hotel but let down by its Executives Lounge
desc: Second time staying at this hotel. The first was years back, before COVID redefined travel and staycation. But happy to say that despite the years, it still well maintained and a good place for a family staycation. The place still looks great and welcoming. Love the inclusion of JENO, the robot, to the team as it was fun seeing it in action at the lobby. Food at Makan@Jen is still a good place for breakfast with its wide selection. Just find some of the combination strange. Example having Otak-otak but no nasi lemak. Omelette station with no diced pepper or mushrooms. But that is just me picking on the little things. Service staff were fantastic, especially impressed with the front desk and the housekeeping team. Both were great at their job, efficient and super friendly.

title: Singapore Hols
desc: Excellent location and very close to Underground and shopping malls! Rooms very nice but pot luck if you are next to a family with young children as walls very thin! Lucky to move into a new room on the last two nights! Breakfast first class and so much choice and staff very professional! Would recommend the club room as otherwise no other bar facilities which is lacking! Roof Top bar superb for amazing views! Gave up on fourth attempt to order a pina colda no chance! Lots of spirits on order apparently!

title: Good hotel convenient location
desc: The Jen is a good hotel in a very good location. Middle of Orchard road above an MRT station. Room (panorama with club access) was good and spacey. Room facilities were nice. Cleaning time is a bit late, and twice I “interrupted” the cleaning lady around 13:00 and 14:00) Again, too late. The hotel has a lot of families with kids and it can be noisy sometimes. Club facilities are good, but “food” time is too short.

title: Lovely hotel in Orchard gateway.
desc: No doubt the location is unbeatable. Right in the centre of Orchard gateway and Somerset. But easy access to the all the activities of Orchard road. The room is well design and bed comfortable. Cafe also serves great breakfast. Service could be better as expected from Shangri-La. Missing the warmth and smile that I am used to at other Shangri-La. The must visit is of course the sexy pool at the roof top which overlooking the Singapore skyline. They also have a nice roof top garden which is so peaceful for some quiet time and relaxation if you don’t mind the heat. Overall, it was an enjoyable stay and will definitely be back.

title: Amazing location and pool
desc: Very nice hotel in great location of being at Orchard Gateway so easy to get to shops, eateries and connecting to the MRT/buses. City view room (1839) had amazing views but be aware that there is a huge Singtel tower opposite the hotel, think all city view rooms would see this. The infinity pool is phenomenal with amazing views. Can get quite crowded and don’t have to be a hotel guest to come up here… Drink choices amazing and serving staff very friendly when serving you at the pool. The house robot called Jeno is an extra bit of fun who brings towels etc to your room when requested. Hotel can be quite loud due to the number of guests and location - the hotel can’t help this obviously except the rooms seem to have a door between them in case people want connecting rooms -

title: Lovely hotel with some issues
desc: We had a nice stay at Jen for 6 nights in two panorama rooms but it wasn’t perfect. 1. The rooms were lovely but not the same. One had a nice bathtub overlooking the city and generally a much nicer bathroom with a smart mirror. The other room had a dark and a much smaller bathroom without a smart mirror and without any view. I believe these rooms should not be charged at the same rate. The beds were really big and comfortable. 2. The breakfast was always nice with a good choice and polite service. 3. The pool area is amazing with a beautiful view and friendly staff. The bbq food is nice, the cocktails lovely. Definitely the highlight. 4. The check in process was terrible. We arrived at 7am and asked if we could check in early. We were told that the normal check in time is

Great hotel and excellent location. I wish the lounge is open for business meetings. It is just an empty space with sofa. Otherwise the rooms are good and comfortable for a couple of days stay. Love the pool and gym too but it can get quite busy.

title: Excellent location
desc: Really good location. The hotel was very clean. Rooftop pool is lovely with great views at night. Easy to access transport as a lift from the hotel links to the MRT. Close to loads of places to eat. Great views of the city. Friendly and helpful staff. Masses of choice for breakfast.

title: Nice stay In Jen Orchard gateway
desc: Went to 2nd hotel under Shangri la (1st is Shangri Rasa Resort at Sentosa) at around 1.30 pm, I went to first floor lobby next to shopping mall, then took lift up to level 10 where hotel lobby is located. As I have already received notification to collect room key after paying room charge + S$190 refundable deposit online before arrival, I went to self check in counter where I keyed in relevant data and scanned my Identity card, but photo ID failed as my current image is not the same as my photo in my Identify Card as it was taken years ago. I went to check in counter and queued . After a few minutes, I was given a keycard leading to top floor (level 20) Went to the club room, room is nice . After brief inspection, I went to explore Baywatch@Jen ( full of activity), pool

title: Great location for MRT
desc: Great location. Panoramic room was absolutely huge. Very helpful staff. Roof top pool great but has banging music . No where peaceful to sit out. The bamboo garden also has loud music. Superb breakfast with multiple cuisine options. Hash browns next to the bacon with same tongs. I pointed this out but nothing changed the following morning. Executive lounge very good with lovely canapes. Alcohol available 1730 1930. Soft drinks, coffee 24/7.

title: Great hotel in good location
desc: Currently staying at the hotel. Arrived with some anxiety after some of the reviews. Room ready early. Have Panorama room, huge, great views. Club floor included plenty of soft drinks during day, coffee tea. Around 1500 small selection of cakes appear. 1730 canapés and alcohol time. Small selection of food, but adequate. Vegetarian guests may struggle. We have mentioned this issue and hopefully tonight my husband will have a selection of canapés. Staff on floor very pleasant and helpful. Alcohol wine lager and small selection of spirits. Breakfast can be taken on club floor but we have been to main breakfast in restaurant Talking of breakfast well it's amazing. British, Asian, continental etc. Surprised to find bread & butter pudding! Gave it a go though. Well you have to.

title: Central, new, clean, beautiful rooftop pool
desc: + very centrally located, close to mall + amazing roof top pool + very new + rooms new, clean but nothing special + well managed checkin/checkout - almost no veggi food option in the rooftop bar Tip for families: do not book regular 2 bed room with 2 kids. The single beds are really narrow (real single beds!)

title: Excellent hotel, excellent location
desc: Fantastic central location with direct lift access to the MRT station and attached shopping centres both with excellent food courts for a delicious and well priced indoor meal. Orchard Road isn't especially charming but is within easy reach to a number of great Central Singapore spots via MRT. Rooms clean and reasonably sized. Rooftop bar and pool absolutely amazing - great cocktails and bar food and views for days. Breakfast buffet fresh with something for everyone.

title: Not in my top 25,Luxury Escape, I think not
desc: While the hotel is in a great location we bought a Luxury Escape package and it was far from it for 60 somethings. The rooftop bar was an absolute nightmare with hip hop music and all the foul language that is associated with it, even at 10 o'clock in the morning. I wouldn't recommend this hotel for families if you are wanting to laze around the pool with your children unless of course you want them to learn how to swear. I was very disappointed especially with Luxury Escapes who still are offering packages saying how relaxing it is.

title: Great Location for Shopping Experience
desc: The hotel is located in town and surrounded by big shopping malls all within walking distances. Can spend the entire day and yet to finish with all the malls. Spoilt with choices for food options in this area. Transport to other places is also very convenient. Facilities wise is complete but we have no time to explore or experience. Room is clean and service is friendly. Recommended!

title: Had an excellent time!
desc: I stayed here for 3 weeks and I check out tomorrow. All I can say it's such a lovely hotel. Rooms are very comfortable and quite well equipped. Any requests we had for extra tea or small things were dealt with promptly and I really appreciated the prompt assistance with printing of the PCR tests and health declaration forms. Service was always prompt and warm and I cant think of anything to complain about. Appreciated the complimentary snacks that they send for longstay guests. Laundry service too was prompt. I think only the first time i didn't not know the laundry cutoff time so ended up receiving laundry a bit late but wasn't much of an issue for me. I was on a work trip and this was a nice home away from home. I couldnt make much use of the poolside since it was a

title: Location is the best!!! with High quality of service!
desc: Location is the best! Just a few step to the center of Orchard street with lots of dining and shopping. Also just above the subway and bus stop! The room quite small but comfortable with great price! Highly Recommended!!!

title: Highly recommend
desc: Wonderful hotel . Can’t fault it . The breakfast choices were second to none . Outstanding staff throughout and clean rooms . Location was perfect snd as the the train station was underneath this was an added bonus .

title: Prison Bathrooms
desc: We stayed here for 3 nights. Lets start with the good: The location is pretty good, the mall is under the hotel with access to metro. The pool is also very nice. Good luck getting a chair by the pool though, its super crowded so you have to reserve a seat at 8 am when they open, otherwise you will not find a place. The Bad: The room is VERY disappointing. It is very small, but it's the bathrooms that was shocking. The toilet is separate from the shower, and the toilet door has a gap on top.. A gap! plus the entire water closet is constructed from glass which just echos all types of noise! I do like privacy in the bathroom and honestly for this reason alone I would never stay here again.

title: I Do NOT recommend
desc: The Rooms are SMALL and the bathroom door is OPEN on the top and the bottom and its made of glass so all noises are louder as you use the bathroom. The pool was nice but super full and no seat are available.

title: Rooftop Pool Facing Marina Bay Sands!
desc: Jen Orchardgateway by Shangri-La is a great hotel located well in Singapore. The hotel has a rooftop pool with stunning views of the city skyline, including Marina Bay Sands. The rooms are on the smaller side but feature a new, fresh finish. The staff is friendly and helpful. In addition, the hotel is conveniently located above a mall and has an MRT station right underneath, making it easy for guests to explore all that the city has to offer. This makes it a great choice for both business and leisure travelers.

title: A nice hotel in the busy Orchard
desc: One of the nicest hotels i stayed in. Reception was in the 10th floor. Room was not that big but it was comfortable. Hotel was above the Somerset mrt line and has a bus stop across the street. There are plenty of food options in the area. They have a direct elevator going to the 10th floor from the mall. They also have a zen garden. The pool has a fantastic view. Breakfast had a lot of options. The cleaning staff were friendly too. Free coffee anytime. And of course, Jeno the robot delivery. A few comments though, rooms were not that sound proof, you can hear people talking in the other room. Menu in Makan sometimes do not serve rice (a basic for Asians). You can cook your own waffle and pancakes, but will take up time and sometimes messy. The noodle bar only serves spicy broth

title: Very business hotel
desc: The hotel is very busy and business. However, the services such as lifts extra weren’t bad with it being so busy but the room wasn’t suitable as a family room. Now let’s talk about breakfast; TERRIBLE SERVICE. There are a lot of options but they don’t really cater a lot to Muslims since most of the things aren’t halal and the service is so bad. I asked the chef to clean the pan they cook the egg in as he has cooked ham in and I can’t have anything with ham or that’s been close to ham, he was really upset and started laughing in a mocking way (excuse my choice of words as I can’t think of the correct word now) and didn’t like it but he did it. Then I asked him to make the egg well done and flip both sides which he didn’t understand and his colleague told him and again he didn’t

title: Nothing was seriously wrong but nothing was seriously good either.
desc: Pretty generic property without personalized service. Staff at the front are often too rushed and busy to accommodate any requests or questions in a considerate manner. Pool is nice and the location is great for having access to public transit. Food at the pool restaurant was not very good. Housekeeping staff was great. I also appreciated the little touches like the welcome ice cream. The power outages during the evenings make it difficult to charge electronics if you have an early flight. Overall it was a good stay but if you are looking for personalized service and attention to detail, I would suggest looking elsewhere.

title: Tigeriffic Beercation
desc: Super stoked and excited to check out this 1st ever Beercation experience. Location of this hotel is right smack in the heart of Orchard Road with lots of restaurants & shopping. Check in was a breeze at the reception with helpful and attentive staff. Upon entering the room, it was WOW at first sight! The room was decked up with Neon lightings at every corner with lots of pictures opportunities. Definitely love the limited edition merchandise plus a bucket of Tiger Crystal. For beer lover like me, best part was the 2 hours free flow included in the package @ Baywatch. Overall experience at the hotel deserve more than 5 stars! Highly recommended !!

title: Amazing first beercation experience in Singapore!
desc: Got to try out the first ever Singapore beercation and wowed by the fixtures of the rooms. Comes with free flow beer at the infinity pool that has implacable service. Breakfast had good spread and staff was attentive to detail during check in. An overall amazing experience.

title: Lovely hotel, great location!
desc: The hotel is in a great location, with the Somerset station on the MRT having a loft directly into the hotel lobby (until 10pm and you have to change lifts to get to the hotel rooms). The room is nice, spacious and clean with a great city (paid for) view. They also put a cute card in our room along with chocolates for our belated honeymoon.

title: City break with family, Gem of a hotel
desc: Leaving this ‘gem’ of a hotel tomorrow after our 5 night city family break. Hotel is ideally situated close to all the Orchard Road shops and MRT making it the perfect location to see the sights and explore the city. The roof top pool is outstanding with amazing views across the city. Rooms are cleaned daily, staff friendly and attentive (thank you Zoey!) and huge selection for breakfast. Would highly recommend…. Now heading to the @shangri-la Rasa for our ‘beach’ break. Thank you for a wonderful stay.

title: Honeymooning in Singapore
desc: This hotel was excellent, very comfortable beds & great services. It is in a great location in relation to the major attractions & right above an MRT. The lounge & pool are top of the line, Crimson was exceptionally nice & helpful with giving us recommendations! Would highly recommend

title: In love with this place
desc: Great location with 3 Interconnecting malls,MRT & Bus stop located opposite. Breakfast spread by far the best out of so many hotels I’ve stayed in & it’s the 1st time that throughout my 4D3N there I still didn’t manage to try all the breakfast options & they oso change it everyday unlike others that we’ve stayed before where their breakfast spread wasn’t alot & they don’t even change it everyday. Can always see housekeeping around & rubbish placed outside the rooms are hence oso quickly removed & disposed👍& housekeeping is friendly as well as we asked for “Do Not Disturb” but they still make the effort to ask us if we need our room refreshed when they see us along the corridors. We will be back again soon

title: DONT rely on "by Shangri-La" part
desc: In short: do NOT recommend the hotel as it is not “Shangri-La” service standard at all. If you decided for it, do not choose because of “by Shangri-La” part as you may get extremely disappointed. Positive: Location is great just on top of MRT and shopping mall, which is especially suitable for tourists. Room on corners (Perhaps such as rooms ending with 12) toward Orchard road have a nice and unique view. The reception staff are kind and helpful and also allowed early check-in, and arranged for a chocolate gift anniversary (which I am thankful for). Swimming pool is very nice, with warm temperature, jacuzzi, nice view, and even tubes and lifeguard. Breakfast spread and quality is good. Negative: Hotel seem to be short of staff. Room in the first few hours had a moist smell,

title: Great location and fab pool
desc: Lovely stay in the centre of Singapore. Perfect location if you love to shop as it’s bolted onto a HUGE shopping centre with a lovely food court at the top to try local food. The pool also lived up to expectations as the view of the city was fab. The rooms are basic but perfect for what you need. Directly opposite a bus station and on top of the underground which are both extremely easy to use and immaculately clean. Would recommend to both families and couples. You really are only 10/15 minutes from most attractions on public transport.

title: Good stay
desc: I love how close this place is to Orchard. Breakfast buffet is great and it’s amazing how the chef socializes with guests. Rooms are clean and I think you get what you pay for. I traveled here with family, but there was a business vibe to this place. Or perhaps that’s just it is in Singapore.

title: Amazing stay
desc: We booked the club lounge room which was big enough. The room was clean and very comfortable. The staff was very polite and helpful. The gym was a liitle small and less equipment. One of the best ist the amazing infinitiy pool and the georgous breakfast.

title: Cool Pool
desc: Had a Deluxe Room with Club Room Access for 6 days . A very nice but smallish room with all the necessary accessories. The staff were very friendly and polite. The Club Room was very good during the day and for finger food and drinks early evening. The rooftop infinity pool and bar are fantastic. Central position with underground rail station in building. A small criticism of breakfast in the Club lounge when some days heaters under cooked food were not lit leaving some food to be cold. Duncan D Melbourne Aust

title: Ok for what you pay for
desc: Hotel was ok for the price paid. We had to bring our own luggage up to our room, breakfast had a large selection however a lot of dishes were very bland, basic complimentary toiletries (only bath gel and combination shampoo and conditioner provided), club lounge had only a little bit of food - unless you came early you’d miss out! I’m room menu limited and only until 9:30pm. Pool however was great, nice views of marina bay sands and pool amenities were clean including change rooms. The bamboo sky deck was also very nice, great for some quiet time. Very convenient location with MRT station and 7/11 store next door and very close to orchard road.

title: Stunning views
desc: First time we’ve stayed at this hotel but would definitely stay again. It’s in a great location and had stunning views - especially at night. We arrived very early in the morning and although our room wasn’t ready for check in, we were offered the use of amenities on 19th floor to shower and freshen up. Our room was large and bed comfortable. We started each day with buffet breakfast with lots of hot and cold options. We were only at the hotel for two nights but had a fantastic stay and would recommend

title: We feel conned!!
desc: We booked a room with breakfast which is about 32 sgd if you purchase it here however you can upgrade to ‘club’ and get free breakfast, evening drinks for 2 hours and tea/coffee/soft drinks 24 hours - this costs 50 sgd. when we asked about upgrading we were told it was still 50 even though we have already paid for breakfast??? Seems a little unfair and as if we are being penalised for pre booking which is a guarantee of revenue for the hotel. Surely, we should be offered a reduced rate as we have already pain for breakfast??? The hotel have been particularly unhelpful and we are both incredibly disappointed at their attitude as we have 4 nights in KL booked in a Shangri-La and then another night here when we return. We’ve been loyal to this chain of hotels and I am a member of

title: Rooftop pool amazing
desc: My husband and I stayed at the Jen Orchardgateway for the last 3 nights of our honeymoon. Hotels location is fantastic - we took MRT from airport to Somerset station, follow signs for orchardgateway in the station and walk a few metres to the lifts, take lift to 10th floor (lobby) and that's it. We The staff were welcoming and we were lucky enough to check in a little early. We were given wine and chocolates when they found out it was our honeymoon. Room was clean and comfortable. Shower and toilet are in two sperate 'pods' of frosted glass next to each other rather than a separate bathroom with a door. Rooftop pool is really fantastic. Views over Singapore and Marina Bay Sands. Food around the pool tasty and good value. Comfortable bean bag style seating to lay on as well as

title: Minimal service but everything else is fantastic
desc: We stayed at the Jen Orchardgateway for 3 nights as part of our 6 day/5 night stay in Singapore. We were travelling from India with our 2 young kids and had stayed in a panorama room. We checked in on a Wednesday at around 1:30 PM after checking out from the Rasa Sentosa. The 1st thing you'd notice about this hotel is the stark contrast on the guest services. You will need to get your luggage on the trolleys at level 1 and take it right up to your room yourself. Check in was smooth and the staff was very quick on the system and checked us in within 15 mins of arrival. The room was exceptional. We stayed on the 12th floor (1210) and the room was very spacious and comfortable and had amazing views over the orchard road. It even had a TV integrated with the bathroom mirror and

title: Centrally located for shopping and MRT access.
desc: Conveniently located in a busy shopping area. Beautiful view of city skyline from the pool terrace (level 19). We requested for higher floor and quiet room (request fulfilled!) and they managed to prepped our room early hence we didn’t have to wait for 3pm check in as per advertised. Room is good enough for 2 adults. If you’re traveling with more than 1 kid, it will be too crowded (especially with potentially more luggages and stroller) Hotel lobby (like most hotels along orchard road) is on the 10th floor. MRT is directly below the building. Clean room. Highly recommended.

title: Stunning pool, great location
desc: The location was the main reason we chose this hotel and it did not disappoint. Situated above Orchard Gateway shopping centre with Somerset MRT station accessed via the lifts, it could not have been easier to get around Singapore. The room was not large, but adequate for our needs, with a comfortable king bed, plenty of drawers/hanging space & everything we could need provided. The curtains blocked out light extremely well and we found it very quiet, ideal for sleeping. The only minor drawback was the frosted glass shower/toilet doors in lieu of proper walls, but many hotels seem to be opting for this now. I do wish they’d stop. We had an issue with our fridge not working and staff could not have been more helpful, sending someone to check it within minutes of our call, and

title: Overpriced tiny room
desc: Beware if you are booking a double room for two adults - the tiny room had two twin beds pushed right against each other! No help with luggage on arrival, you are on your own. A very poor “welcome”. Pool is great but the mandatory online ordering of food and drink is confusing and user unfriendly. In short, it’s a highly overpriced 3-star hotel. Location is probably its best asset. I wouldn’t stay here again.

title: Right above somerset MRT
desc: The hotel is right above somerset MRT station - you can get a lift straight down - very handy in the heat of Singapore. The other wonderful thing about this hotel is the swimming pool - again after a hot day walking the streets of Singapore a pool with a view is divine. The buffet breakfast was amazing catering for all with standard fare of bacon, eggs, suasages & hash browns but also laksa, Indian & Chinese food. Didn't need to eat all day after that.

title: Great location, Clean and Fresh Room hotel in the heart of Singapore City. Its 4 stars Shangri-la hotel
desc: I was staying there at end October 2022. Located in the heart of Somerset and very close to center Orchard Road makes this hotel worth to stay especially if you are prefer to stay at downtown. Food and shopping are very easy to find surrounding this hotel. The reception located at 10th floor and easy to access by 2 lifts provided. Check in and check out was easy and fast. They provides auto check in and out machines as well. Room was clean and fresh. Minimalist for superior / deluxe room. But amenities wasn't minimalist though. They provide 2 box PH water everyday. Under the Shangri-la management this 4stars hotel worth to stay especially if you're looking for downtown city hotel

title: Pretty basic hotel
desc: This is a pretty basic hotel for what you pay for it, which came as a slight surprise. We’re staying here for only three nights, so we’re not moving hotels, but I regret not choosing a five star hotel now that we’re here. We’re in a superior room, which looks pretty good on paper, but is in fact quite cramped because of its inefficient design, even for only two people. And everything has an almost ‘business budget +’ feel to it. There’s a pool, a gym and a sky deck which are all decent, and the location is excellent, but if your expecting any kind of luxury-like comfort (or anything charming, quirky or tasteful) I would suggest you choose a different hotel. I now understand why the reviews are quite mixed on this hotel - if you’re in one of the standard rooms, things just aren’t

title: Great location
desc: We stayed at Jen Orchard Gateway in October. The hotel is very conveniently located on Orchard Road, with Somerset MRT station just next to it. There is also a shopping centre next to the hotel with supermarkets, bakeries, restaurants and shops. The hotel itself is lovely and ticks all the boxes. Amenities in the room were very good and the rooms themselves were a good size. The rooftop pool at the hotel is the highlight of the hotel. It is truly stunning, especially at night when it is lit and you can enjoy views of the Singapore skyline. The only slightly negative thing about the hotel is that the reception staff could have been friendlier. It felt like they were just there to do their jobs and were lacking in warmth and friendliness. Overall, I would recommend the hotel

title: Well Situated
desc: The hotel is situated in a busy business and shopping district right next to the MRT station ( same as the Tube but much cleaner and quieter). On reading that you would be forgiven for thinking NOISE !! Not a bit of it. The hotel is peaceful, clean, with well appointed rooms. From the inside would you have no idea where it was. The staff are attentive and friendly. I do not know her position in the hotel but Jeraldine seemed to be everywhere and was always ready to assist, quite literally from hailing a cab to cleaning up in the lounge. The pool area was very pleasant in itself but completely monopolised by Australians morning, noon and night. We gave up after a couple of try’s. As an exercise I went to the pool one morning before breakfast at about 9 am just to see the

title: A solid 4 stars; but avoid the in house coffee at all costs!
desc: We just had our first overseas trip since the world started opening up again & we chose delightful Singapore. Staying at Hotel Jen was great, the room was plenty big enough & the amenities are great. The rooftop infinity pool alone is enough reason to go back! Breakfast buffet was really nice, but give the coffee machines a wide berth; truly some of the worst coffee I’ve ever had. This might be controversial coming from an Aussie, but if you are a black coffee drinker like me, do yourself a favour and use one of the millions of Starbucks to get a decent Cafe Americano (pretty close to a long black)! Readers of my reviews will know my partner is a wheelchair user & this hotel was great for access. My only negative comment is accessible rooms are only available in the more

title: Fabulous stay
desc: We had a fabulous 4 night stay at Hotel Jen which is conveniently located above Somerset MRT and shopping mall and in the heart of Orchard Road. Hotel is great, staff are friendly, polite and helpful. Breakfast at Makan is excellent with lots of choices. Rooftop Pool is fantastic with amazing views. Our Panorama Room was fabulous with great views, very spacious, nice and clean, really comfy bed, lots of storage space, great shower/s and TV on bathroom mirror was amazing. Club Lounge was great, lovely views, good selection of drinks and nice food (especially the desserts). We'll be staying here again.

title: A Great Gateway to Orchard
desc: With its very convenient access to Somerset Station, and the various malls and shops of Orchard Road minutes away on foot, JEN Singapore Orchardgateway did live up to its name as a nice starting point for our trips around the area and beyond. And, when our feet got tired from all the walking, JEN's rooftop gardens and the poolside provided refreshing and charming spots to take in the sights. Its restaurant Makan@JEN was also a great option for dining during those times when we preferred not to wander off too far.

title: Almost Perfect
desc: 1. Excellent location at the heart of Orchard with the Somerset MRT station at its Basement. 2. Deluxe family room was very spacious with 2 Queen beds. 3. Breakfast buffet had a lot of variety. 4. The Shangri-La app provided a seamless check-in & check-out experience. The only negative experience we had was that the housekeeper left our room door open throughout the day after cleaning our room. Good thing, none of our personal items were lost.

title: Great location & quality hotel
desc: Stayed for 4 nights, great location in the main shopping mall ‘Orchard Gateway’ with lots of restaurants and other malls close by and walking distance. Hotel starts on level 10 of the building, rooms were nice and fairly modern. Metro is just next to the hotel and also convenient to get to Marina Bay Sands and the night safari. Rooftop pool was good and could drink cocktails and get snacks whilst relaxing

title: Enjoyed
desc: Amazing stay everything was perfect ,the pool,the food ,the amenities ..thanks for all the stafff, it was my first time but it won't be the last..thanks for all the management ..we enjoyed everything..

title: Beyond all expectations
desc: My daughter and I took up a luxury escapes deal in September 2022 at the Jen ORCHARDGATEWAY and had the best time. Room after unpacking was suitable with heaps of storage and king bed being separated although close was extremely comfortable. The location is perfect for popping out for night shopping. A lift to 10th floor reception was not a issue and we were comfortable with looking after our own luggage. Taxi pick up on departure was efficient. We respected our privacy so shower/toilet set up was not a issue. There was a slight hick up with check in so a complimentary entry to executive club was a perfect treat enjoying a wine at end of day. I then decided to take up same deal for my husband and myself in November. Unfortunately my husband became quite unwell and was

title: Staff helpful. Pool area excellent Kandahar world class customer service . Breakfast great.
desc: Using 2 different lifts to get to room annoying. No foyer to relax in. No staff to greet you from taxi and help with luggage. Must get to level 10 to check in. Bed far too hard. Room cleaners fantastic very courteous. Check in staff great. We are an older couple and wish we could have room service menu on a card. Also description of different restaurants and menus could be printed.

title: Lovely Singapore stay!
desc: Lovely stay, good location, good pool, good air con, iron in room, comfortable bed, very small gym, Starbucks in reception, ideal for high street shopping, clean, good shower and a bath. Must go to 7.45 pm skywalk in the gardens, little India and Arab street!

title: Perfect location, great hotel, amazing pool!
desc: We recently stayed for 5 nights in a Superior City View room overlooking Orchard Road. Location is perfect, just above Somerset MRT and the Gateway shopping centre. Check in was friendly and efficient. Room was spacious, fresh and spotless. Buffet breakfast was one of the best I have ever seen, a large selection of hot and cold food, fresh fruit and yummy pastries. We spent a lot of time at the infinity pool just relaxing, a big thank you to Kandau and all the other Staff members for always welcoming us with a smile and their friendly service. We will definitely be back!

title: Convenient with some great extras
desc: Whilst the room was small by Australian standards it was functional & cleaned well.We had a Club King room which entitled us to the 2 hour Happy Hour in the Club room with drinks & nibbles and breakfast in our package. Staff were friendly, rooms were serviced well and the pool was refreshing on the hot humid days. We are above Somerset MRT station and once we got the hang of the great system we found we were located close to everything we needed. Taxis too were cheap.

title: Ideal location, AMAZING roof top pool!
desc: We stayed here 2 nights, it’s ideally located on Orchard Road and above a Metro Station so getting around was super easy. As well as a shopping plaza with tons of good options. The rooms are spacious, spotlessly clean with super comfortable beds and pillows. Most exceptional is as the roof top pool with a 360 degree view of the city. We’ll worth the stay here!! The staff at reception were fantastic.

title: Fantastic location and amazing pool
desc: Lovely hotel marred by the first reception staff we met at check in arrived after travelling for 24 hours and was greeted by a receptionist she was rude unhelpful as they had made a mistake with the booking and said we wasn’t due till next day ( not sure why you would turn up a day before ) so showed my paperwork with booking on nothing asked if I could use the phone she said she would dial number then came back and said no reply ! So I called and straight thro funny that ! Kuoni said booking was there they would ring hotel and call me back he did he spoke to her and while I was talking to him she was rude while he was on phone he said it would get sorted in morning so I agreed to pay £947 yes £947 with no explanation only that was a holding fee I just gave in ! But was furious

title: Excellent
desc: Great location near to bus and mrt. Lovely clean room was spotless and sheets were changed daily. Breakfast buffet was the best I have ever seen. It had everything you could ask for. Rooftop bar was a lovely way to cool off and relax after some punishing Singapore shopping.

title: Pleasant stay with the JEN.
desc: After having a very unpleasant stay at a Shangri-la Hotel in Penang, I made a visit to The JEN Orchard Gateway in Singapore, and than you to ALL the staff here I was treated as one expects. The rooms are great, above all very clean, and service and attention throughout the property was TOP LINE. There s not ONE point that I can make other than FABULOUS to stay here, location excellent, facilities, hotel staff and just the friendliness I received is a credit to all and I would recommend this as a great choice. One other great feature is the 19th floor infinity pool with views over most of this amazing city. I hope that in the very near future I can return to this hotel and appreciate all that is on offer. Thank you to all at the Jen Orchard Gateway for a most enjoyable and

title: My first experience was not good anyway
desc: Well.. i guess the hotel is not worth with uts price.. My first experience in this hotel : 1. No room ready, while I need to wait until 3pm while I bring my family who need a rest to have med check on next day 2. The frontdesk staff was ‘busy’ without knowing whay they do, but I saw them talking to each other 3. Self check-in machines was not working, 2 items stay in the lobby without any function 4. Service so standard or even less?? 5. Staff named Viksen or whatever even didnt call me when the room was ready until I asked the frontdesk for uts readiness What should I suppose to do??

title: Spacious, Convenient and Beautiful
desc: We stayed in panorama suite. Beautiful view, very spacious room with walk in wardrobe and huge vanity for make ups. Room comes with free breakfast from the lounge and all you can drink at the afternoon happy hour. Great pool in the roof top over looking the busy Orchard road. The location is perfect too: on top of a shopping centre and train stations; walking distance to shopping malls and restaurants. In the same building, there is a Hom yoga studio too. If you are up to some stretches Husband loves the day bed in front of the window. Definitely will stay in the same hotel again next time.

title: Great Hotel
desc: Stayed for 5 nights bed and breakfast from the 6-11 November Location- Excellent location in middle of Orchard Road situated directly above Orchard gateway mall + Somerset MRT. Reception- Very friendly staff and had no problem checking in Room- we stayed in a standard room with city view . Room was spacious clean + modern with usual facilities. Only one thing is the bathroom and separate shower are open plan with floor to ceiling frosted glass although this was not a problem for me and my wife it may not be for everyone. Breakfast- one of the best breakfast’s I’ve had in a hotel with a very wide selection hot or cold. Pool Deck- what can I say this is incredibly beautiful with a breathtaking view of Marina Bay and the city probably only bettered by the pool at Marina Bay

title: Amazing breakfast and pool
desc: We loved our 4 nights here. The rooftop pool is amazing and excellent breakfast with the biggest variety of options I've ever seen. The location is also so convenient situated in the same building as the train station and shopping centre. Would definitely recommend!

title: Very basic hotel, but good location
desc: I must admit I was expecting a lot more from this hotel. It was a very basic hotel, with no sense of refinement let alone luxury. That said, it is well located and clean, but these were pretty much the stand-out features and that is something I’d say about a budget hotel if it is the only good points. Room was small and basic, the bar is outside by the pool so it is closed when it is raining or thunder warning….. they told me nowhere else to get a relaxing drink in the hotel, sorry bar closed. Pretty much every afternoon of my stay, and yes I know that is Singapore weather, but surely a bar indoors? Breakfast buffet was plentiful selection and quite tasty but in the evening when it transforms into a dinner restaurant there are no menus, only a QR code to scan, I asked for a menu

title: Couldn’t fault it!! Loveliest staff
desc: Couldn’t recommend this hotel more. Great location with the train station right next door and great shopping around. The staff are all super lovely and helpful with tips on what to do when in Singapore (special thanks to Mavis!!). The pool is great. The rooms have everything you could need and are clean. Buffet breakfast is delicious with heaps of options. 10/10 all round!!

title: Great pool and location for shopping
desc: An excellent hotel in the middle of the hustle and bustle of Orchard Road. We were a family of 21 people and the hotel catered for us very well. The check in was easy but you have wheel your own bags in trolleys which are not very good on carpets. The rooms are small but very functional. Great views from many of the rooms. The breakfast buffet was a welcome surprise with some of the freshest croissants and a range of Asian dishes as well. The pool area was the highlight and is incredible. Lastly, a shout out to Cheryl who helped arrange a birthday venue for my wife which (although rained in the main venue) went well for the backup venue.

title: The best location for families travelling with children
desc: This was our third time staying around Orchard Road and first time at Hotel Jen. Orchard is the perfect location with small children and this hotel was great value. We went for a Club Deluxe room on the 14th floor which was big enough for the extra bed we needed and through stunning floor to ceiling windows gave us views of the Orchard Christmas time hustle bustle. The room though not complete mod-con luxury was really clean and comfortable. Up on the 19th floor there is a rooftop infinity pool (deceptively long in length) that again offers great panoramic views of Singapore including the Marina area. The hotel is connected to Orchard Central and Orchard Gateway shopping & restaurants, walking distance to iON and Paragon malls and is also connected to Somerset MRT so really easy

title: Painfully slow check-in and check out
desc: Great hotel, great central location, rooms are spacious and very well serviced. Several comments the check in and check out process is amazingly slow, I can never figure out how that can make such an easy process so slow and drawn out. I guess with the downturn in tourism, standards seem to have dropped, previously Club room occupants checked in at level 19, now its level 10 with the masses, the food standard at breakfast and afternoon, whereas the quantity and quality of drinks seems to have fallen off. overall enjoyed the stay.

title: Painful check in.
desc: Our check in experience was extremely poor. We arrived an hour early for check in and were told our room was not ready and they they will call us to confirm when it was available - all good so far. 30 minutes after the official check in time there had been no call so we returned to reception and joined a very long queue. After another 30 minutes of waiting we finally got our key - one full hour after the stated check in and two hours after we first arrived. There were a lot of very frustrated customers being looked after by only one or two staff (one would disappear out the back for 5-10 minutes at a time). Outside of that poor introduction, the rooms are comfortable, modern and clean. The pool is excellent with fantastic views. Hotel is central to Orchard Road and is

title: Easy stay in central Singapore
desc: Staff are amazing, location is super central with easy access to MRT and taxi services. Breakfast staff were great, especially Mavis - who was a delight and really helpful with lots of tips and advice

title: Just a short stay
desc: Rooms were good although bathrooms were a bit small and cramped, Overall the service was very good, good restaurants and food,. Nice area to be in,and all very clean, only a brief visit but enjoyable.

title: Poor stay. Management review of operations needed.
desc: Stayed last week. Late check in after 4.30pm as the room was not ready. Only able to access room after dinner. I specified in my booking there would be 2 adults and 2 kids under 10 years old. There was insufficient bed space allocated. My spouse and I did not sleep well. I had a sore neck. I was shocked because this is an experienced hotel operator. I also noticed that some tourists at the lobby are not happy with the check in process as well.

title: Great Location
desc: Booked 2 rooms with connecting door which was locked when we arrived but quickly fixed. Arrival is on Somerset Rd side but the actual lobby is on Level 10 accessed by lift. Note there are extra public lifts from the adjacent Orchard Gateway shopping mall that takes you directly to L10 in front of the Makan restaurant however it also serves the malls carpark levels so busy as. Lobby has the normal checkin counters but is also streamlined with self checkin & checkout computers. There's a forex machine but the rates are terrible. A robot is on standby to act as quasi room service staff. Our standard room was tight with deconstructed bathroom ie separate frosted glass toilet & shower cubicles with the basin/sink outside but hidden slightly with a slide out screen. It does work and

title: Average stay in a very good location
desc: The hotel is very conveniently located at the beginning of Orchard Road. You can reach many attractions by walking. The hotel is located on top of the Orchardgateway mall, but the access to the mall was not convenient. There are only two lifts and they are also shared with mall visitors to reach the car park. During our stay, one of the elevators was even not working, which made it impossible to reach the mall via the internal lift. The hotel was overall good for a night stay due its prices and location but it was without any soul. The rooms are basically decorated, without even a glass to drink water or get ice from the ice dispensers on the floors. The vending machines on the floors pretty much useless, if you are tourist, since they were not accepting credit cards and

title: Stunning pool and views of the city
desc: Fantastic hotel in orchard road shopping area with access to subway and out of this world pool. Stayed in panorama room which was out of this world , 180 deg views of the city. Access to club room was definitely worth it , can be used for a quiet breakfast with beautiful views and happy hour between 5-7 with free alcohol ( beers and spirits ) and lovely snacks. Great selection of food also in main breakfast area. Roof top pool is worth the stay at this hotel alone, a swim here at night with the Singapore lights is spectacular and with pool service with amazing burgers and a cold beer and cocktails. Definitely worth looking at compared to more expensive more popular hotels at the marina as this is better value. Hotel is right in the shopping area and access to subway below hotel

title: A bit of service would be nice!
