desc: Wow, we are waiting for a room at this hotel for more than 8 hours now after a 10 hour flight from Johannes. Arrived at 7.00 and at 15.00 still waiting after 8 hours to get the rooms reddy. That’s the most impressive service we experienced so far in our four month around the world trip. The rooftop pool is nice though. Can’t comment on anything else sofar.

title: Highly recommended, wouldn't hesitate to book again.
desc: Another excellent hotel (Shangri-La group - see previous review of Shangri-La Kuala Lumpur). Great location, literally adjacent to the Somerset station on the Singapore Metro's Red line. Access to the station via the shopping mall (Food Court on 4th floor). Also, directly opposite bus stands serving many routes. Check-in out straightforward. Rooms clean, beds comfortable, all have a safe and fridge. They're cleaned everyday unless you indicate otherwise. Breakfast is also very good, lots of choice. The roof-top pool is a must. Great place to unwind in the evening. Food and drinks also available. Lovely views across the city, you can see the iconic Marina Bay Sands Hotel. There's a small gym on the same floor as the pool. However, the reason for mentioning this is that the

title: Lift your game
desc: Arrived early went up to check in. We were too early for our room. Given access to the club. Sat around for an eternity. At 15:00 a couple of hours of waiting went to check. Told our room was ready but they needed to check it. Went back to the club. Another hour went and followed up. Still checking room. WT how long does it take. Finally got the room. The aircon is right above the bed. We turned it up to try and get the racket to stop. In the end had to turn it off at night. Room was musty. Positives view was great. Christina Chow was great in recognising we were unhappy. They did give us a bottle of wine and a credit as an apology that was appreciated. We stay at the Shangri-La when we travel. Never again here such a let down and not what we are used to from

title: Slightly disappointed
desc: Stayed here from the 27th of January, two superior rooms, Rooms were clean, but basic, also has glass walls for shower and toilet, might be trendy but not very private at all. Also has a roof top bar, but if it rains, that’s it, you either get wet because no sheltered seating or you go out of the Hotel for a drink, very disappointed, considering the amount we paid, sorry wouldn’t stay again.

title: We'll be back!
desc: We would definitely come back to the Hotel Jen. Location is great and using the MRT is simple once you know what you're doing. Check in was easy but not a lot of interaction from staff. It would have been nice to have some sort of tourist desk or brochure stand with points of interest. I found the staff are merely just doing their. They're polite and answer any questions but that's about it. The room was small but adequate for what we wanted as you're not there much. Everything was clean and tidy. We never had to wait long for a lift to arrive any time of the day. The pool area is amazing and we would come back hi just for that. We could always seem to get a deck chair and towels were easily accessible. Breakfast was probably one of the best we have experienced. They had

title: Great location and vibe
desc: We arrived from the UK early morning check in staff were great they could see how tired we were so said they would send us a WhatsApp message when our rooms were ready. We headed up to the roof top terrace and enjoyed a relaxing drink looking over the most amazing views. We were amazed to get a message at 11am saying our rooms were ready (2 couples). We had a quick bite to eat then went to bex for a couple of hours sleep before heading out. The hotel is in a great location above a shopping centre. The bar and roof top pool both wonderful. Even the food was decent value and tasty. Would happily recommend and return.

title: Friendly staff but bad life guard at pool
desc: Me and a few friends came to Jen @orchardgateway for a stay and my trip was so splendid as the staff was super friendly and welcoming. However, the lifeguard at the pool, ‘Zul’ was the name kept playing with his phone and isn’t being responsible for the job. Called him several times to ask him some questions but no answer from the guy and I ended up asking the bar counter. Please address this issue to serve customers better. Overall, it was a pleasant stay.

title: the hip hotel that wassn't
desc: Jen is supposed to be their hip designer brand of Shangri-La. It doesn't really work. The vibe of the public areas is more school cafeteria than hip hotel. The hotel is understaffed - long lines at check-in - and the staff appear demotivated. On the good side, the location is great and the bedrooms are clean and well appointed, if a bit small. The bottom line is that you can likely do better for less .

title: Wonderful time!
desc: We had a wonderful stay at Hotel Jen. The pool was fantastic, we swam every day. Location was ideal with SMRT being right underneath the hotel. Our biggest highlight was the breakfast team. We spent every morning with Mavis. She made us feel extra welcome and was helpful with our kids, tips on getting around Singapore and exceptional service. She was like a part of our family. Thank you Mavis.

title: Not worth the price
desc: Good location but slightly let down by the hotel itself. It is not anywhere near the standard to Shangri-La which it's supposedly affiliated with. Rooms are run down, very small and not a great outlook. The rooftop pool looked lovely however it was too busy for us to end up swimming. Gym was small too. Overall the hotel is fine but for the price that we paid, I don't think it was worth it and wouldn't stay again.

title: Sub Par Customer Care
desc: To be fair, the hotel was very nice but the customer care was inferior. I accidentally left behind some medication on check out day, attempted several times to contact the hotel and was put on hold each time for over 20 mins. I had no choice but to contact the Corporate office for assistance and Crystal was nice enough to reply and relay the message of urgency to the hotel but no one ever called back. The issue of medications are crucial to those ho need them. Obviously not important to Jen by Shangrila Orchard Gateway. I was left on pins and needle to refill a prescription while overseas. A genuinely nice hotel stay and experience was completely negated by such negligence and lack of care for a customer's well being.

title: Well placed
desc: Well placed hotel next to a shopping mall. Reception on the 10th floor. Good gimic with robots coming to your room if you ordered room service. Only one bar which was on the roof top where the swimming pool was. OK if the weather was good. Breakfast plentiful and good quality. OK for a stopover.

title: A nice hotel in a convenient location.
desc: Recently stayed here for 4 nights in a Club King room. Room was clean and modern, beds were comfortable and water was stocked in the fridge daily. As other reviewers have pointed out, there is no separate bathroom. The shower opens into a powder room within the room, as does the toilet. This didn't bother us as we were travelling as a couple however I can see how it would be an issue for business travellers etc. The room was slightly on the smaller side, but relatively consistent with other Singapore accommodation we have used. The club lounge was fantastic. Staff were very attentive and breakfast was always fresh with a good range - we did eat in the main restaurant on one morning and there was a significantly larger range of food, however we enjoyed the peaceful environment

title: Good short stay
desc: We only had 2 nights but enjoyed every moment. It is a little confusing finding your way to reception the first time depending on where you are coming from. Too many lifts. The room was very comfortable and clean. Breakfast was very good with many options. The rooftop pool is sensational. It is located in a good safe area of Orchard Rd. If we stay in Singapore again, we will stay there

title: Good choice for exploring Singapore
desc: Situated in the center of town with excellent access to MRT (next door to the hotel entrance). Get yourself a tourist pass (attention, at MRT Kiosk they just accept cash !) and Singapore is yours. Difficult to find accomodation which is better connected to public transport. Roof bar with nice pool and gorgeous view over town. Bar food there is relativly expensive, but of good quality. Singapore Sling is especially nice. Rooms got a great view and are quiet. WiFi is fast and reliable. Breakfast is average, we are a bit missing the "asian touch", even when it comes to curries. Bit more spices would be nice. On the other hand, choice of breyd and cheese was very good. Staff is helpful and friendly.

title: Lovely stay - loved the swimming pool!
desc: Once I'd finally worked out where the hotel was (much confusion with the mall!), there was quite a long queue to check-in which isn't ideal after a very long flight. There were counters without staff, and at peak times it would be ideal to have more staff working. The room was clean and large. I specifically booked this hotel for the rooftop swimming pool and I wasn't disappointed. I arrived at night, and with all the city lights, the view was wonderful. The rooftop bar and food was good quality and reasonably priced - the staff were super helpful. The swimming pool the next day was great to use. When I arrived in the afternoon there were plenty of chairs available. The pool was great to swim in and to relax and enjoy the view.

title: Location of the Hotel is the best with a great swimming pool on the 19th floor...
desc: We stayed at this hotel for 4 nights in February 2023 with our twins. (age 11 years old). The hotel is just next to a shopping mall and opposite the MRT and hop on hop off stations. Both our children and us loved the hotel very much. Check in and check out was very fast. Our room was cleaned every day in a wonderful way. Especially the breakfast offered by the hotel was excellent. Lots of choices. I would recommend it to everyone. Every employee was very kind and helpful. And while you're staying at this facility, don't forget to take advantage of the swimming pool. The pool on the 19th floor and its surroundings are beautiful. We will certainly stay at this hotel next time we Singapore.

title: Fantastic from start to finish
desc: Booked 2 city view rooms, very efficient check in with friendly and helpful staff. Well sized, clean rooms with comfortable beds. Fantastic roof top pool with city view including the Marina Bay area. Pool bar and bbq were fantastic. Location was ideal, right beside Somerset MRT station and on orchard road. Overall a great experience and highly recommend

title: Central, Comfortable, Equipped, Quiet
desc: Hotel is centrally located and good for shopping! Don Don Donki that is connected in the same building is 24hours! There's a coffee shop called Coffee Smith open 24 hours too. Now who needs sleep?! Hotel room is clean, well-equipped & quiet. Gym is open 24/7 for a much needed workout after a pigging-out session! Staff is all polite and helpful. Checkout was a breeze with the keycard dropbox. Vending machine on every floor in case one wakes up hungry. Also provided is an ice-dispenser which my sons appreciated muchly.

title: Lack of real "bathroom" lets down the whole experience
desc: Cannot rate a hotel that does not have a separate bathroom. You walk in with frosted glass toilet, then frosted glass shower, then sink then beds - with small "divider" between. Completely unsuitable for anyone other than solo travelers and couples who don't mind watching and hearing each others intimacies. Was traveling with adult daughter - was simply uncomfortable the whole time. This fashion for not having proper bathrooms should be called out for what it is - cheap and shoddy construction to cut corners. A shame because otherwise location is excellent if you want to stay around Orchard Rd and the 19th floor pool is really special (though beware it shuts promptly if there is a storm - which is not unusual in Singapore). Breakfast is a production line but OK. Service was

title: Life in a shoebox
desc: We had stayed at the sister hotel Jen at Tanglin on the way to UK and booked this one at the same time for our return journey at more than $300 Australian per night. Once again, no help with luggage and you have to take the lift to the 10th floor to check in. Then a different lift to the rooms through miles of corridors. The staff are all in khaki tee shirts and all look like students and the room was minuscule. Despite the promise of an upgrade on my voucher subject to availability, I was not given one on either of my stays. The room was so small there’s no door for the bathroom and you step out of the shower into the room. Queues for breakfast meant everything was cold by the time you got to the table. The best part of the hotel was the pool on the roof. A nice size with a

title: Perfect Location
desc: We stayed at this hotel for 10 days during March/April. It is located at the heart of the shopping district, there is also a bus station across the street and a train station just below the hotel which is extremely convenient for making your way around Singapore. This hotel is a perfect base, you can get to wherever you need to go using the SMRT trains, being above the Orchard Gateway shopping centre is great, plenty of restaurants and shops available some which are open 24 hrs or late into the night. The room was spacious, clean and modern with lovely views across the city. I would recommend getting breakfast included, as the variety of food and the service is impeccable. Be aware it can get busy past 09:00 for breakfast, I would recommend going down earlier. The staff at the

title: Disappointing stay
desc: Great location , right in the heart of Singapore with easy walking to restaurants , shopping. Etc Typical JEN hotel, funky and upbeat vibe Sensational roof top pool and surrounding area to unwind and relax .. amazing views to be had The robots are a quirky way of getting your room service and other items Food choices are limited for room service , given it’s the same menu as the in house restaurant Makan We had a club level room and have stayed at many hotels with this level of offering evening drinks and canapés Level 19 is where evening cocktails are served and the views here are spectacular Unfortunately the food here was extremely underwhelming and you’d have to really question the value of the club level room If you don’t like chicken your In trouble ! To

title: Great location, nice rooms
desc: Great location particularly right above MRT. Great buffet brekky. Only disappointment was that there was never any seating at the pool, with more towels etc ‘reserving’ seating and bean bags than people in the pool; and also never a table free to be able to have a rooftop meal.

title: Weird room setup, otherwise good hotel
desc: The room had a really weird set up. The bathroom was completely open to the main room, making it very un-private! Only one small door to give any privacy but it was way too small to actually do anything! It looked like perhaps there should have been more doors to ‘pull across’ but unfortunately not in our room. This might be fine for couples but isn’t great for anyone else. Also the toilet has a big gap at the top of the door like a public toilet meaning that you can hear everything happening…whether you want to or not! The staff were courteous and helpful, breakfast good, location good but I can’t get over the room configuration.

title: Average
desc: We stayed at three hotels during our stay in Singapore. We rated the JEN number 3. A little disappointing when compared with the other two. We acknowledge that it is a four star establishment so this may have played a part. Arriving at the 10th floor reception, with our luggage, we were met by staff in t shirts and jeans. A little too casual for our liking. Staff were friendly enough when we made contact throughout our stay and the Club Room we had was clean and tidy although badly in need of an upgrade. The 10th floor breakfast area was a bit of a madhouse so we availed ourselves of the club lounge we had access to - a lot more relaxing and civil. Access to the club lounge in the afternoons for drinks and nibbles was a welcome distraction as was the large and generally well

title: Don't bother
desc: This hotel has a mid floor reception which means when a cab drops you at curb you wait in a queue to get a lift to hotel reception on L10. Lifts in this place are a real weakness. Up, down, it's ridiculous. Check-in is on L10 and it's incredibly slow - I booked Club room for two nights. Most frustrating was starting a room service meal order at 9.25pm but had to take a work call then came back to order at 9.32pm and was told we stop at 9.30pm, get something from the vending machine. The entire experience reminded me why I'm not a fan of ShangriLa brands. Don't stay here.

title: WORKCATION
desc: My husband and I were on a workcation for a week in Singapore. After much searching, I decided to stay at Jen Singapore Orchard gateway by Shangri-La. I wasn't disappointed with my decision. Here are my thoughts on the experience. 1. Wifi was reliable and speedy which was very important for my husband’s work. 2. The location was very convenient. Somerset MRT station is just below the hotel with countless shops and restaurants(the hotel is connected to one of the biggest malls called Orchardgateway). Getting around in MRT and walking around was very easy, clean, and safe. 3. Staffs were very friendly and professional. 4. Room was very clean and spacious. All the provided toiletries in the bathroom were a huge bonus. Toothbrushes, toothpaste, cotton swab, slippers, and the

title: Great location
desc: Fantastic location with lots of great food options around the hotel. Rooms are cosy but they are clean with everything you need and very quiet for such a central location. Staff are friendly and the breakfast is good. Would definitely stay here again.

title: Affordable but blah
desc: Clean, basic room. Deluxe room very small. I had to upgrade. Pretty roof with lovely pool. Besides the pool, I would not recommend. Food terrible. Service mediocre (to downright bad on the pool deck). Front desk situation a disaster.

title: Short stay
desc: Stayed here with friends for a short 4 day stay & was not disappointed . Rooms were very well appointed & had everything you would need in a hotel room .Staff were very friendly and welcoming . Highlight was the rooftop pool & bar with some amazing views of Singapore . Only negative was that on check out the express kiosks were broke so it was slow check out because of amount of people trying to leave that day . All in all would highly recommend & would stay here again

title: Worst Stay in Singapore
desc: We booked the Jen Orchardway four months ago and arrived on the 10th March 23. We booked a panoramic Room based on reviews but mostly on description and photographs of the rooms and pool area. What a disappointment. Here is what they do not tell you. The hotel is located on the tenth floor of the building with the very basic entrance on the ground floor where looking confused you are directed by T shirt and jean clad staff direct you to the 10th floor. We had a bit of luggage but no offer was made (or asked) to assist. We made it to the 10th floor where at reception we were once again greeted by staff in jeans and green T shirts. (Very Casual) We were given keys to our Panoramic Room on the 13th Floor and no further assistance with our bags. Arrived at our room and almost

title: Communication issues
desc: The hotel is well situated on Orchard Rd, above a shopping centre and Somerset MRT station. However the main entrance can be hard to find because the taxi set down point does not have direct access to the hotel doorway and the hotel name is not evident .You are more likely to be dropped by the shopping centre entrance where a lift to the hotel is hidden behind a row of small sidewalk stores. Our Club Deluxe room was large and clean with a fantastic view straight down Orchard Rd. No coffee machine and only 2 tumblers, no wine glasses. The shower was good but the separate toilet had no ventilation or fan. We chose to have breakfast at Makan which had a very wide variety of food but which was very busy and crowded. The Club Lounge on the 19th floor offered nibbles and drinks for 2

title: Great Singapore Location
desc: Great location, elevators take you directly to the MRT subway station. Breakfast buffet is huge but overpriced at SD$90 for two if you do not prebook the breakfast-included room rate. The rooftop pool is very nice with great views but the food and service at the bar is marginal at best. No place really to enjoy a cocktail after a long day unless you go into the shopping center.

title: This is truly a swindle!
desc: I realise that the accomodation in Singapore is expensive but this is is ridiculous! The prices compare to the Hilton in town but the facilities definitely do not! Rooms are 70’s beige, bathrooms are tiny and there is nowhere inside the hotel where you can have a drink indoors (unless you pay the extra for upstairs) . We were treated to a view of guests sitting in the pouring rain on towels! I have stayed in 1 star hotels in Africa with a better attitude and level of service to this. Meant to stay 2 nights checked out next morning. AVOID

title: Nice hotel in a central location
desc: We stayed at JEN due to the close proximity to the MRT station (Somerset). This made travel around Singapore very easy as we were on the North South Line which gets you around the city. The hotel is located above Orcahrd Gateway shopping centre on Level 10 if coming from the MRT B1 level (so easy to access). Alternatively, they have a ground lobby if you are arriving by car which also takes you up to level 10. Singapore makes the most of its space as a city, and the JEN is no excpetion, making sure all space is efficient. The rooms are on the smaller side, however, as a couple this was no issue for us as we were out most of the day exploring the amazing city. If you intend to spend more time in your room than in the city, this may not be the hotel for you (or the city for

title: Nice hotel and value for money
desc: Stayed here for 5 nights. Check in process was straightforward and hotel is a little dated but is well located close to all main shopping centres and easy to get taxis/metro. Rooftop pool and bar are cool and plenty of space but if it’s raining there are no alternatives to sit inside hotel and have a drink. Would stay here again.

title: Amazing
desc: Amazing hotel with a fabulous infinity rooftop pool. Rooms were spacious with everything you need. Great city view. Food was delicious with lots of choice, staff very welcoming and nothing too much trouble. Great location. Will certainly return

title: Wonderful customer service
desc: We recently stayed at this Beautiful hotel on a short stopover on our way to Oz. The rooms were spacious and immaculately clean, the rooftop pool and facilities were amazing, breakfast was excellent and although the room wasn’t ready quite at check-in, the customer service we were given was absolutely excellent! I wished we were staying longer, it was fantastic! Staff were friendly, professional and polite throughout. Wouldn’t hesitate to recommend this hotel to anyone staying in Singapore, the location is also brilliant.

title: Great hotel! Central and rooftop pool
desc: Clean room, great location right in front of the train station. The hotel is literally above a shopping mall with an excellent food court and cafes right on Orchard road. There is a lounge on top floor with great food and drinks and the rooftop swimming pool was definitely the highlight for us. We would stay there again when visiting Singapore.

title: Perfect hotel for seeing all the sights of Singapore
desc: Just returned from a week staying at this hotel. All staff were friendly and helpful. We had a club room so had additional benefits of use of the club lounge with free food and drinks for 2 hours each evening, which was welcome, however limited vegetarian choices.On checkout we were still able to use the lounge and had shower facilities available near the pool. Rooms were spacious with a large bed and extremely clean. Excellent buffet breakfast was available with a wide choice of various cuisines. Hotel was very convenient for getting around with a metro station below with direct lift access. Plenty of shopping malls with designer shops and food outlets right on the doorstep. We would definitely recommend staying here to friends and family

title: Jen Singapore
desc: hotel ok, good location Pool nice troublesome getting into hotel from shopping centre/train station lifts are extremely busy with shoppers and delivery people. Then onto another lift to access rooms.

title: Absolutely loved this hotel
desc: We had an amazing time here as this is a great hotel with great facilities and great views. The rooftop swimming is just brilliant, the staff were extremely friendly and we want to do more of Singapore so I will definitely book here again. I would 100% recommend, if you can, paying for the room that includes the free drinks and breakfast…club deluxe room was ours with great views of the city and access to the free drinks in the evening which starts the evening off perfectly.

title: Relaxing stay at the Jen Orchardgateway, perfect for a short stop over.
desc: Perfect for a relaxing two day stop over. The pool on the roof was great for a morning swim, busy with kids in the afternoon. Room clean and quiet. The MRT station is right below the hotel so easy to get around the city. If shopping your thing, then a walk through the mall below the hotel will take you out onto Orchard road.

title: Good location and pool.
desc: But that's about it. The room was very very small, which was not unexpected given you are in a big city. However, it was really poorly designed. There is no room to place an open case, the bathroom is setup poorly thougjt out and without a full length door so anyone staying with you will hear all your bathroom activities...very clearly. Walls are thin so could hear a guy snoring from one wall and a guy playing with his kids at 6AM on the other wall. The bed was comfy but the pillows weren't great. As per the title, the location is handy being on top of the Somerset SMRT station but it's a pain to get too as you need to take two lifts and they get busy. I would prefer one life and be across the road. Pool was good, nice view etc. For the price I would have expected better.

title: Another great stay
desc: Returned to Hotel Jen after a break of five years and it was as good as it was last time. Well appointed, comfortable rooms, friendly staff, a fantastic breakfast buffet and breathtaking pool. The location is so convenient with multiple eateries, shops and MRT al downstairs.

title: Good city hotel
desc: Hotel in good location mid of city and over a mall ! Reception team functional but strict to manage you to room only! We asked and expected twin bed as booked but just told not available! Rooms clean but nothing special the view is OK. We don't have breakfast as in mall lots of options for it. The pool is amazing, but a bit of dirty water needs better circulation. Menue is good and the burger is good. Staff is OK. Checkout easy on box drop !

title: The Pool Deck is the WOW Factor
desc: Recently returned from a 10 day trip to Singapore and a stay at JEN Singapore Orchid Gateway... accommodation booked via Luxury Escapes. On the whole we enjoyed our stay at this hotel and give it 4/5 stars. Firstly, the hotel is situated on Orchard Rd, above the Singapore Orchardgateway Shopping Centre and also right abover Somerset MRT station... a great location. The hotel starts on the 10th floor and requires one lift to the lobby and another lift up to the rooms. Check-in was smooth and staff friendly. Our Luxury Escapes booking included early check-in (subject to availability) and a city view room. Both of which were not delivered upon. They advised they were fully booked and could not provide early check in and our room was on the opposite side to the city... view

title: JEN has it all
desc: What a great hotel to stay in the heart of Orchard Road. Can't beat the location with Sommerset MRT right below the hotel. I am impressed with its well-appointed rooms, great breakfast with an amazing variety, friendly staff, and the amazing infinity pool. I will definitely be back.

title: Just excellent!
desc: We spent 3 nights in the hotel. We had a deluxe family double, a spacious and comfortable family room with two big double beds and great views of the city with the Marina Bay Sands in the distance. The hotel is on top of the Orchard Gateway shopping centre so you get tons of options if you want a quick bite and don't fancy the hotel menu. MRT is also right under it and there's a constant stream of taxis available as the entrance is next to the shopping mall main door. The beds are comfortable, everything was in a good state of repair, breafkast selection was wide and good quality. We tried the burgers by the pool and they were great and the pool itself is fantastic, especially in the evenings as you get to see the city below you lit up. Overall a fantastic place to stay, it is

title: Superb
desc: Everything was wonderful at Hotel Jen. Would stay there again in a heartbeat. We had an interconnected room. The buffet breakfasts were the best I've had in my life. There are so many options and the omelet making man does the most delicious omelets. The pool and pool bar where you can order snacks till 11pm is great. The burgers are delicious. Orchardgateway mall and MRT was below us and it was so convenient. Thanks Hotel Jen for the best time x

title: Great location and roof top pool
desc: Great location with the MRT station below and fantastic local food walking distance. The room was perfect for what we needed as we didn't intend on spending long in there. Where our room was located it was a 250m walk down the hallway from the lift. We were fine with the distance however if you needed something closer I would request that when arriving. As part of our deal we were supposed to get 2 drinks on arrival. When we checked in they said beer or soft drink and the drinks never came. We were lead to believe that we would be able to get them at the pool bar but would need vouchers. When we went down to reception to get the vouchers they gave us 4 cans of beer in a paper bag. Great for those who like beer (I don't). The pool had an amazing view but considering the

title: Surprisingly good
desc: Hotel above Orchard Gateway and convenient for many shopping centres including paragon. Rooms compact but well designed with good storage, good lighting, lovely pillows . Breakfast pretty good with nice breads but would have liked some yoghurt with the fruit and cheeses too. What was a big surprise was the excellent lunch at the restaurant - mix of buffet and a la carte. Great food and really good value mid week.

title: First Choice Hotel
desc: The obvious first choice for a hotel in Singapore would probably be the Marina Bay Sands with its amazing roof top infinity pool but once I saw the Jen Orchardgetaway I didn't consider any other hotel, the main reason being its amazing rooftop infinity pool which has a great view of the Marina Bay Sands. The hotel is obon a much smaller scale and much cheaper but less busy and more personal and has the excellent Shangri-la service. The location is perfect between Orchard Rd and Somerset, above the shopping centre with direct access to the metro, which makes getting around very easy and surrounded by plenty of shops and restaurants. I booked a club room for the extra advantage of the club lounge which was worth every penny, the really good breakfast, drinks and snacks at the

title: Location, Location, Location
desc: Overall, a good hotel in a fantastic location. Be aware that you need to get an elevator from ground level to the 10th floor to check in. This can be a bit difficult to navigate if you haven’t stayed here before. Rooms small but comfortable and well maintained The rooftop pool is undoubtedly the jewel in the crown of this hotel. The views are fantastic and the pool is clean and nice to swim in. Great choice and quality of food for breakfast but it is a bit of a production line to get guests in and out as quickly and efficiently as possible. Felt a bit rushed. We had a club room. The club lounge is a nice space with fantastic views of the city. There could be a bit more choice of snack options and maybe add sparkling wine to the alcohol options? We had a late flight so the

title: Hidden Gem in the Lion City
desc: Hidden Gem in the heart of Singapore. At the top of 313 shopping centre and Somerset MRT rests a groovy hotel by the name of Jen. So friendly, accessible and comfortable. Great sized rooms and loved the club lounge and infinity pool on the roof. Cant wait to come back!

title: Great Hotel in great distance to all places and the infinity pool and the view was stunning!
desc: The hotel is very well located and with the MRT Station the connection to the places to visit, are easy to reach. We took the MRT from the Airport to the Hotel and this was no hassle at all. We have chosen the city view and had the Marina Bay Sands Hotel right in front. The room was in the 17th floor and the rooftop infinity pool was just great and also because it is open till 10pm. The hotel as such was not surrounded by hight buildings and therefore we felt very comfortable even though we stayed in right in center. Shopping Malls around were easy to reach. The room was well equipped and had all the necessary goodies available. Unfortunately the night light was too bright and this we mentioned at reception. Our problem has been noted and friendly employee promised us to take

title: Great location, service could be improved.
desc: Great location in the middle of Orchard road, and a beautiful looking swimming pool, but the service lets this place down. Queing to get in, queing to get out. Two desks of five open to check in and check out. The staff at breakfast were courteous and efficient, and house keeping was always quick to deliver, but if you can't get in and out orderly, that is the first impression and your last impression of a place. I received a pre check in email asking if I wanted a late checkout due to a late flight. I had said yes, but go a reply that the hotel was fully booked and could not accomodate my request. If you are fully booked, why ask if I want a late check out. Rooms were adequate, if on the small side.

title: Travel lodge is better
desc: The Shangri-La name was a draw but that is about it. Clean and well located, but basic. No real reception and having to get 2 lifts to room was annoying with long delays. Tried to order food at 9.25 to be told kitchen was closed, before it was supposed to be. Roof top photos are better than reality. Basically it’s a travel lodge for those used to the uk but at Singapore prices. Won’t be back.

title: Location, location with a rooftop pool
desc: Hotel is very clean with interconnecting rooms for Families with younger children. Right on an MRT station it makes for easy moving around the city. An afternoon swim in the magnificent rooftop pool with a cocktail is a great way to finish your tourist day.

title: Poor Value. Nice Pool and Clean but way over priced for what you get.
desc: We booked and large executive room with lounge access including breakfast. The room was a corner room of the stated size but largely wasted space of a corridor albeit with nice windows and view but waste of space and the actual bed part of the room was small. The shower is in the bath. So you're paying over S$600 a night and have to climb over a bath to have a shower. When we arrived we couldn't find the reception as it is on the 10th floor but little signage to show where to go. I think there was meant to be someone on the ground floor but she was out, so we were walking around with suitcases, trying to work out where to go. Eventually girl returned to a desk and told us to 10th floor. It's also confusing as it's attached to large shopping centre. Some may love that. We don't.

title: Warning.. night restaurant.
desc: Warning. The hotel restaurant at night should be avoided. We returned two dishes of uncooked satay chicken and experienced a very long wait and utter confusion. No apologies or compensation, just a typical money grab situation. Not a great experience for this type of hotel.

title: It has everything I need
desc: Really enjoyed my stay. The food , the view and the location is really amazing. There are so many malls nearby, it's very convenient. I highly recommend,. And the friendly staff is also a plus point !

title: Great hotel on orchard
desc: We checked in at 3pm and it was swift. Self checkin kiosk assist you with a speedy check in. Rooftop pool was amazing with skyline views of Singapore. Staff was helpful with directions and defo made our stay better

title: nice, will be back!
desc: great help with the concierge. the rooms are nicely furnished and adequately sized. super nice check-in with room amenities like room spray and essential oil. thank you jen team. will be back super soon!

title: Staff are not happy
desc: We have stayed here about 5 times now. We noticed this last trip that none of the staff seem happy (other than the luggage lady on level 1) - no one smiles and it doesn’t have that fun vibe it once had. We had an extra bed and it was on the floor like a futon (cost circa $100!!) housekeeping also had not turned off the alarm Clock so that woke us up at 1am. The club lounge is also no longer worthwhile, the light dinner food is cut into tiny portions and the drinks arent cold. There is literally nothing there during the day but coffee soft drink and dry biscuits. The pool has a fab outlook but the deck is in a bit of disrepair and it’s very hard to find a lounger. We do like that it is above Somerset station so it saves money getting to and from Changi airport. There is

title: Best located Hotel
desc: Very Good location nice rooms and appropriate room size .It is more of a business hotel with King Size bed and fluffiest Pillow Robot room service very good breakfast . Elevator from the 10th floor straight open into the somerset Mall . We had a 4 Rooms booked and my Room was upgraded to the Higher floor (18Th Floor) due to the Jade member . But to the disappointment Rooms are all same category only the floor level changes and also it make very inconvenient to come to the 11th floor as they don't issue 2 Floors combined key to us . In fact my parents and My son's family was in 11th floor and every time i have to come to the reception which is on the 10th floor to take them in our rooms .

title: Location, service, value, quality ✅✅✅✅
desc: Recently stayed at the Jen for 4 nights on holiday and can’t recommend this place highly enough! We had a panoramic club room on the 14th floor and if your budget can stretch to it, the upgrade is definitely worth it. Even as a family of 4 with 2 roll out beds (they only advertise that the rooms can take 1, but still loads of room with 2) we had loads of space, rooms were spotlessly clean and beds were comfy. View down Orchard Road is incredible! The lounge is also a massive plus as the food is of a high standard and a couple of hours of free drinks is quite a significant saving in a city like Singapore where $18++ is the benchmark price for a large beer in the main areas. The big wow factor with this hotel however comes when you walk out to the pool area on the 19th floor.

title: Food and Shopping
desc: Prices are reasonable, easy access to hawker food places, direct access to subway and of course to shopping. Walking distance to more great shopping places. Rooms are clean and concierge team very helpful.

title: Great stay
desc: Stayed here for 3 nights, hotel is very nice, polite friendly staff , amenities terrific. Rooftop pool & bar is fantastic with terrific views. MTR right next door along with shopping , shopping &more shopping & food everywhere

title: Wow!
desc: We took a taxi and was dropped off infront of the hotel however we went into the wrong entrance and ended in Orchard gateway shopping mall. Unfortunately there is no entrance to the hotel from here. We then found the Orchard Road exit from the shopping centre and despite walking 3 times up and down along Orchard Road, we couldn't find the hotel. 20 minutes later we asked someone in the mall who directed us back to where we alighted from the taxi. All we could see was Live New Asia as the Hotel Jen sign was obstructed by a column. In the foyer we found out we had to then take a lift to the 10th floor to check in. Check in was seamless and our room on the 17th floor was modern and clean. The lifts opposite the Makan restaurant go to B2 which is the MRT station level. The hotel

title: Thankyou to make our stay so memorable 👍👍👍
desc: We are so happy, all the staff very nice and welcome. Our room so clean & tyde. During breakfast time, all the Service team doing great job same for All the Chef's also. The food was delicious, everything set up great way. We are so enjoy & happy for our stay.

title: Great stay!
desc: We stayed here for three nights. Hotel is in great central location. Very busy hotel, took a while to check in but staff very helpful, Rooms very well soundproofed- couldn’t hear traffic. Beds really comfortable. Rooftop pool and sunbathing area really lovely- especially in the evening. Rooftop area is quite small but we managed to get chairs. Food at pool bar restaurant was average. We would stay here again. The staff made it!

title: Nice but there are better hotels in Singapore at this price-point
desc: I was drawn to this hotel given the “Shangri-La” name. Having been to Singapore many times before we thought we would try this hotel. Unfortunately, it’s only “Shangri-La” by name and did not meet our expectations of the “Shangri-La” brand. We had a 3 night stay at JEN Singapore Orchgateway by Shangri-La and while it was lovely, I probably wouldn’t return. I will start with the positives: the hotel is very modern, clean, our room was spacious and the rooftop pool was great. However, the hotel was clearly very busy and as a result customer service was really lacking. Compared to other places we’ve stayed in Singapore, there was nothing personal about your stay in this hotel – there’s no real reception or concierge, nor a nice bar where you can sit an enjoy a coffee or drink

title: Great location
desc: This is a very comfortable modern hotel, in a great location to explore Singapore. We had a large comfortable room with access to a great rooftop pool. Singapore is expensive, so don't expect anything different at the hotel, a beer on the rooftop is a must!! The best thing about the hotel is the location, with Somerset station underneath within the shopping mall. We were in the country for 3 days so got the 3 day tourist rail card which I would highly recommend as you get unlimited use on the underground. You get $10 back when returning the card. If flying in, get one at the station at the airport and then it's about a 40min journey to the hotel with one/maybe two really easy changes (walking to the opposite platform). All in all worth staying at in Singapore.

title: Thankyou & hopefully can visit again for future.
desc: We are so happy, Our stay so memorable. All the staff so nice and doing great job. Our room so clean & tyde. Get very nice city view from our room. During breakfast, all the food so delicious. Thankyou.

title: Irritating staff polluted my stay. Hotel is pricey for what it offers and where it’s located.
desc: I came to this hotel for quite a few times in Singapore, last one in July. The hotel is pricey for what it offers and where is located, some rooms are small, with bathroom and shower open and next to the bed. The marble (or whatever it is) is often scratched, looks run down. The moquette looks old. The personnel is kind until things go smoothly - when they turn to more complex, or when tailored decisions are required, they need to “talk to my manager” and then come back with the same broken record (I had a couple of episodes). Way to improve. For me it was convenient to come here to due to proximity to the office. But from next time I will look elsewhere, plenty of better options. Oh, I forgot, for the sake of honesty: marvellous pool.

title: Mixed experience
desc: Our recent event at Jen Orchard Hotel had its share of disappointments. While the location was convenient, We encountered several issues that impacted my overall experience. The hotel was overcrowded, lacking sufficient space to relax comfortably. Room service ended early at 9:30 PM, inconveniencing late arrivals. The rooms were small and lacked ample storage, further detracting from the comfort. Additionally, the hotel's refusal to accommodate early check-ins, despite booking almost 35 rooms for an event, was a significant inconvenience. Although the location was a positive aspect, these drawbacks affected our stay at Jen Orchard Hotel.

title: Best trip ever!
desc: Amazing rooftop pool view, nice new clean rooms, super friendly and attentive staff. Location is ideal for hanging out around orchard road - the malls downstairs are very nice for a teenage daughter and full of food choices. MRT downstairs is also extremely convenient, as is Grab ride pickup point. Not much of a lobby for visiting friends, but minor issue given all the dining/drinking choices in the mall downstairs. All in all, one of my most pleasant stays in Singapore. Thank you, Jen Orchardgateway team.

title: A Nice Stay
desc: This is a pretty good hotel. Great location, good service. On day one I had a problem with not getting the room type I had booked but they were most impressive in resolving this quickly. They went above and beyond to make sure we were happy. The Panorama Rooms with the dual vanities in the bathroom are a great room, nice and light and large. My only problem with the hotel is that they have made all the common area's too small for the amount of rooms they have. The pool area (while looking great) is always super crowded, the Club on the weekends is always super crowded and the main restaurant is way too small for the amount of guests. Much better to have breakfast in the Club. Speaking of which, the club was good. The food selection was ample and we appreciated it been

title: Fantastic location, pool and breakfast
desc: This hotel is incredible. The location was amazing with a huge shopping centre and MRT right in the building. The pool and pool bar were fantastic and the buffet breakfast was very extensive and had so much variety. The robots were a hit with the kids. We would definitely highly recommend this hotel .

title: Holiday
desc: We had the best time in our hotel bed and pillows so comfy, great pool, service was great. We had an issue with our room on our last night, they immediately moved us to another room with a great view.

title: Lucked in with Jen at Orchard Gateway
desc: Given previous reviews, I had some concerns as to our choice of Singapore hotel for our family holiday, however I neednt have. Our family loved this hotel - the staff we had engagement with were polite, attentive and helpful. The room size of our standard rooms were more than adequate, cleaned daily and had great city views. My only ninor observation was the frayed carpets edge in our room. The jewel of the hotel is the rooftop swimming pool which provides stunning views of Singapore City, especially at night. The swimming pool level also has a rooftop bar and BBQ, the latter serves up some truly delicious burgers. Finally, we had breakfast included in our rate, which I would recommend as the breakfast buffet was excellent. Would definitely stay here again.

title: I is getting worse
desc: 2 day construction ongoing during the night, no sleep and no solution offered by hotel Crazy long cue before breakfast at 8 am Quality of food is still good, bed and room as well. Service is bit less passionate

title: Outstanding!!
desc: This hotel was simply outstanding. A good sized room, super comfortable bed and the most magnificent pillows! Located right above the MRT Somerset station and with all the shopping you could want at the bottom of the lift. Can't wait to return!

title: Great hotel and excellent location
desc: A great location and a great hotel. We stayed 3 nights here and loved it. We had club access which was fantastic. The roof top pool and bar were amazing. The staff were good and the room was comfortable and very clean. It was a bit noisey as the room next door was being renovated but we were not really in there during the day. The buffet breakfast was one of the best I have seen. Great food and service. Would definitely stay here again as it was a one minute walk to Orchard rd and easy access to all the Singapore sights

title: Don’t let the pool fool you!
desc: Singapore was our last stop after visiting 5 other countries across Europe for my family of 5 so I wanted to finish on a high. I’ve been to Phuket & Bali over 5 times and I was quite surprised we weren’t greeted in a similar way like getting a cool welcome drink or have our bags brought to our rooms. I booked 2 rooms at a hefty $550 a night for each room which was more than I have paid before but got fooled by the pool and being part of Shangri-La. The rooms are basic with soft pillows making it very uncomfortable. Not sound proof so you do hear other doors closing or people walking down the hallway. We had a good view however you need to get onto 2 different elevators to get to your room as lobby was on 10th floor and next to shopping centre. No complimentary waters or even

title: Family stop over
desc: It’s efficient, clean, rooms spacious, pool with great views, central, secure, staff helpful and friendly, breakfast buffet choices are good, beds are a good size and delivery robots fun to watch. Happy

title: Mid-range Orchard Road is good value
desc: Well equipped mid-range property with scenic infinity pool at roof top. Steps from MRT on Orchard Road amongst shops & dining options. Buffet breakfast is substantial but not included in Rack Rate - book Breakfast Rate or Club Rate option. Friendly staff. Unfortunately pool bar area under renovation during our stay. Rooms have what needed except space - very compact but well organized room. Decided to find different location after one night due this is a pool inspired Vacation. For those looking for modern centrally located hotel in Orchard neighborhood, would certainly suggest you check JEN Orchardgateway.

title: The Jen Hotel - Completely Disappointing
desc: Stayed at The Jen Hotel Singapore for 5 days after travelling through Vietnam and staying at beautiful hotels for three weeks and it was quite a disappointment. The Hotel certainly has a beautiful rooftop pool and bar with spectacular views of Singapore which in part made up for what the hotel was missing. The train station was also easily accessible from the location and another one of the few bonuses. The Buffet Breakfast required guests to line up for about 15 minutes before being able to go and sit down at a table. The food and beverages were barely worth the wait and the restaurant was noisy with a notice asking guests to not stay longer than 60 minutes. The rooms were clean but very small and basic. The Hotel lacks personality and personal touches. It wasn’t unbearable

title: Absolutely amazing!
desc: We stayed here for four nights and cannot fault them for anything! The room was lovely and spacious - perfect for a short city break. We found all the staff to be warm and friendly. The breakfast was excellent - loads of choice and always piping hot. The hi-light of true hotel has to be its pool though! It is located on the top floor and has views across the city. We visited it at lots of different times of the day and each time it was as beautiful as the last! The location of the hotel is great as it is on top of the MRT station Somerset which we used to get around the city.

title: Zero sound proof - you can hear your next door cough! Poor sleep quality, avoid at all cost
desc: Front desk staff are super friendly and attentive, however the let down are: 1) In the website & 3rd party booking website stated that rooms are sound proof, also made requested for a quiet room at the time of booking. 2) we stayed in the standard room, could hear next door room cough! Talk & flush toilet, we stayed 2 nights --- can't go to bed till 1am after our neighbor is settling down and woke up at 4am due to the poor sound proof, like a cheap motel (ZERO SOUNF PROOF what so ever) 3) You can always hear door slam, people walking down the corridor all night and all morning 4) unacceptable for 4 stars -- SGD $400 / night / room AVOID AT ALL COST IF YOU WANT A GOOD NIGHT SLEEP!

title: Graceful Host and his kind waiters and bartenders
desc: I'd like to express my gratitude for the wonderful hospitality extended to both me and my companion at the pool. Despite inadvertently forgetting to pay for our drinks, the host and waiters graciously understood it as an honest oversight. Special thanks to Kandau Jain for his exceptional service and to the dedicated team. Warm regards, Vinnie. Thank you for permitting me to make up for my mistakes by ordering and paying for next next rounds.

title: Great accom in shopping precinct
desc: Lovely rooms. Comfortable beds - we were in deluxe with a city view. Good shopping and lots of variety. Huge buffet breakfast. Info centre nearby. Difficult to get a seat/lounge at pool level so we didn't use. Checkin took time which was a bit annoying given we were tired from our flight. Would recommend staying here.

title: Location, Location, Singapore
desc: This is a very affordable upscale hotel in the heart of the Orchard District of Singapore which made it perfect for us to explore the area. The rooms are well appointed with the most modern facilities. Clean, comfortable and secure. We had an in room safe and mini fridge. The pool / bar on the 19th floor is a nice place to relax with incredible views. A good location to walk to the many attractions the island has to offer. We’d stay again. Highly recommended.

title: Excellent service and pool
desc: Had a wonderful stay in the hotel This the first stay after 2 years , the experiences still is amazing . The pool was still lovely and amazing still. Great work and kudos to sean, dat and Charlene whom work at the pool bar, excellent service and the drinks prepare by sean where excellent. The check in is smooth and every thing is great Will be back soon to stay

title: Lovely and great staff
desc: Had a lovely weekend stay with family, Love the view of the pool and the surrounding area Good job and kudos to Date,Sean and Charlene they have provided lovely service and seeing Charlene while having breakfast,love the service that was provided and received,will be back to stay again

title: Excellent location for exploring Singapore.
desc: Excellent location, great amenities in the rooms and the staff were all so friendly and professional. Would highly recommend as a base to explore Singapore, there is direct access to the Metro line by lifts in the hotel or an easy enough walk through the downstairs mall. The rooftop pool and bar area is beautiful with great views and the breakfast selection is huge.

title: Not our favourite part of Singapore
desc: Not a great start, we were dropped off by taxi at hotel, walked in and saw one person standing behind a desk, queried if the hotel was next door? Told to go to lift and up to 10th floor where reception is, wait in a line for check-in - .we were early ( 11.00 am ) room not ready so gave us a disc to access the Club Lounge as we were staying in 2nd highest rated room, left our luggage with the reception team and told they would contact us when the room became available. Had heard nothing by 1.00pm so decided to have lunch at their restaurant - food was reasonable but service and comprehension left a lot to be desired! Got food but not drinks we had ordered - asked for bill and they then suddenly appeared with drinks - too late and refused them - hard for them to understand why?!

title: Great operations staff for hosting a party
desc: Held our daughter’s 1st birthday party at lounge@jen and was served by operations staff Kenny and Elisha (among a few others). They were absolutely friendly, helpful and accommodating. It was them who made us worry little about the service and food so that we could concentrate on the vendors and our guests.

title: Direct access to mrt and 313 somerset
desc: I suggest "The location" is the Biggest point here.... Hotel Jen orchardgateway location is very good, directly on the top of 313 somerset, and direct access of mrt to go anywhere around singapore, and a lobby for taxis drop off... Very convenient.....😍👍🏻 U dont have to walk far away looking for transportation especially if u're traveller with kids.... The room was a lil bit small, (i stay in deluxe room), the facilities all standard, the breakfast menu so so... Overall it offer good service and good accessibility, great place to stay if your priority is Time

title: Amazing Rooftop Pool
desc: Fantastic location, right in the heart of the city (i.e.: shops). You are on top of a shopping centre. Huge array of restaurants for dinner very close by too. This is quite a large hotel with large facilities. The breakfast room is well frequented but the queue dimities quickly. Massive amount of food, with lots of variety, available...a great way to start the day. Fill up! I didn't try it for lunch or dinner. I did go to one of the hotel internal art for a drink, but it was very quiet. Most people head up to the rooftop bar which has fantastic views of the city. There is plenty of seating for drinkers or swimmers, and the pool is massive, so you don't feel like you are swimming in a bathtub with everyone else. Not a massive variety of liquor options available, but you are

title: Amazing Family Holiday
desc: We booked 2 rooms for 8 nights. 1 Club Deluxe room(32sqm with bath/shower) & 1 club room(27sqm with shower). Club rooms are on the 18 & 20 level & both come with club lounge privileges. The Club lounge is on level 19 which is open from 6am to 11pm. You can have your breakfast there or in the main restaurant downstairs. There is tea, coffee & soft drink available all day. There is also complimentary drinks & canapés from 5.30-7.30pm. When you arrive at the hotel, you walk in to the building where there is an information desk but you need to take the main lifts to level 10. Then you will take another lift to your room. We arrived after 11pm, the club room was closed so we checked in at reception on level 10. This was a quick & smooth process. Both rooms are clean & tidy

title: Enjoy staying here
desc: Very easy to travel around from this hotel using the underground train service. Despite being in the heart of the shopping district it is very quiet. The pool is in a very cool location, giving great views of the city. Once a week the hotel management do a great meet and greet with drink and food just to say hello and thank you for staying. I have never stayed at a hotel that had done that before without wanting to sell you something. It was great

title: Right smacked in Orchard Road
desc: Location can’t get any better then hotel jen Orchard for those shopping addicts in us. Full of exiting Malls and eateries to replenish your energy after all that walking and shopping. Cool lounge area for cocktails and a rooftop pool with views that is perfect for a proposal.

title: Great Location
desc: It is located in the heart of Orchard, Singapore. If you love shopping, this is a great choice to stay in. It is connected with Orchardgetaway shopping mall and there is MRT station downstairs. Love their room as it is new furnished and quite spacious.

title: Good stay
desc: Room was great. I like the buffet breakfast with so much variety. Location was great with malls all around. Near to MRT station which can easily travel around Singapore. I will definitely come back to stay for my future holiday...

title: Perfect for every purpose
desc: Hotel Jen is in convenient location, no frills and practical hotel but gets all the necessities covered. Stayed for business but i can say that it's definitely good for family too. Just wished that there was more TV channels.

title: Delightful Stay at Jen Orchard Gateway
desc: Had a really enjoyable stay at Jen Orchard Gateway. Highlight was the rooftop pool, which, in my opinion, is much better than the pool at Marina Bay Sands (a lot less crowded & more exclusive to hotel guests whereas anyone can swim at the MBS pool). Meals & breakfast were great, location was good, walking distance to central of Orchard Road (Ngee Ann City, ION, Paragon). Rooms were spacious & clean, staff were courteous and the 313 Somerset mall below the hotel had lots of good food and shops.

title: A must-visit place
desc: Strategically located in orchard road, this hotel also offers easy mrt access via sommerset station. You can easily hop to sommerset mall and orchard getway in less than a minute. Breakfast so delicious, the restaurant offers charging station with keys. You will be amazed with the view from the pool located in 19th floor. This hotel certainly a must visit place in singapore.

title: Excellent hotel on Orchard Road
desc: Stayed for two nights. Arrived very early on the first day. While there was no room available at the time the staff were friendly and allowed us to use the changing facilities on the roof top and relax by the pool. Room was large and had a great view. Even had a separate closet space which helped the whole place feel less cluttered. Room was well appointed and felt new. Didn't try any of the dining options but looked decent. Pool area was very nice and had a great view. Well located right above Somerset station and Orchard Gateway mall. Staff overall very helpful too Wouldn't hesitate to recommend.

title: Excellent hotel
desc: I have just returned from a 10 night stay at this hotel in a Club Room (27 sqm), and I'm pleased to report that it was a very positive experience. Due to the set up of my room, it appeared to be surprisingly spacious, although in saying that, there was only myself staying in the room. I do feel, however, that it would be big enough to comfortably accommodate two people. It was incredibly quiet in the room (on the 18th Floor), with no sound heard from either outside the window or from the corridor. The only thing that might be a problem with more than one person using the room was that the shower and toilet were in separate glass cubicles with the vanity basin situated outside the shower near the bed. Privacy could therefore be an issue if you were sharing with someone

title: Great Location
desc: We stayed at this hotel for three nights and ha a very pleasant experience. The staff was friendly and courteous. The rooms are not super spacious but just enough. It was clean with all basic amenities. The breakfast was great! We are vegetarians and a couple of us eat Jain food. The chef (Kevin)prepared special food for us. Mr. Abdul was extra helpful in arranging this. The pool is wonderful. We thoroughly enjoyed it. We used the complimentary bike service. The location of the hotel is very convenient. A mall with stores and lot of food places is directly connected to the hotel. The MRT is a few steps away. We didn't have any reason to complain.

title: Centrally located above somerset MRT
desc: Location: Very convenient as it is located above Somerset MRT makes travelling around at ease peasy. It is also connected to malls - 313 Somerset, Orchard Central. Hotel: Exit C from Somerset MRT, take the lift to 10th floor and check in at the lobby. Rooms are from 11th floor to 20th floor, pool and gym are at 19th floor. Got the superior king bed room, it was spacious and lots of leg and bag room. Ironing board, umbrella, safety box were provided, even torch light. The bed is comfortable and two types of pillows were provided - the hard pillow and soft pillow. The toilet, however, could be quite claustrophobic as it is small. For having a big room, i would think they could've made the shower room and WC room bigger. All in all, good place to stay. Food: Did not opt for the

title: Great location, but...
desc: I chose this hotel because of its very convenient location on Orchard road, plus previous positive experiences with Shangdi-La-managed properties. While the room itself (bed + storage space and extras that are really great for business travelers, like an ironing board and a steam iron) was okay, we (I traveled with my husband) did have issues with the bathroom. It wasn't so clear from the property photos that there were no doors fully separating the water closet and bathing area from the bedroom area (of course, both the WC and shower area had glass doors, but there was no door that enclosed the whole area). There was also no obvious ventilation vent or ventilation fan on both areas; already on arriving in our room without ANY prior use of the facilities, the non-potable water

title: Made our holiday in Singapore
desc: My husband and I spent 8 nights in Singapore. 4 Nights Hotel Jen and 4 nights Shangril La Sentosa. We struggled with the heat in Singapore so the pool was so appreciated. The pool so being on the 19th floor made us feel we were in command of Singapore. We could see so much! The infinity edge with the glass meant we could be in the pool and look right across Singapore. We booked the club lounge which was relaxing and also has airport control tower like views. Hint for cheap meals...go next door 313 Orchard st 4th floor FOOD REPUBLIC food court. Best food court I have ever been to. Must comment that i read the previous review and was totally unaware of complimentary bike rental??

title: Excellent!
desc: Great in so many respects. Best hotel pool in Singapore. Friendly and efficient service everywhere. Central location in Orchard Rd and access to all transport easy. Mrt right next door accessible from Hotel lift. Free bicycles too if you want.

title: Nice and convenient hotel
desc: this is a nice hotel, its location is very convenient to the city centre of Singapore, with shopping mall and MRT station right downstairs of the hotel. the staff is nice too. the swimming pool is nice too. you can spend a lovely afternoon there, enjoy the sunshine. the hotel is not crowded, the enviroment is good. I enjoy the stay there.

title: So Many Positives
desc: Chose this hotel at short notice based on an image of the pool. I have been blown away by the property. The pool is awesome, nice area to relax and fantastic views. The hotel lifts take you to the Somerset MRT station. It is located above a good shopping centre with lots of eateries that you access from the hotels lifts. Rooms are spacious and well appointed. Ample cupboard and draws for storing clothes. Wifi is free and fast as promised. Breakfast was included in the rate and what a buffet pit is. A real international selection, so much to choose from and all so well presented. I would recommend this without hesitation.

title: Perfect!
desc: The views from the room was awesome. The pool and terrace are fantastic! I recommend this hotel, the location is great and the buffet breakfast very complete. It is near to subway and shoppings. Excellent hotel!

title: Busy vibrant hotel
desc: My husband and I stayed here for a few days before travelling on to Thailand, it's a very busy, vibrant modern hotel, in the city centre, great location, clean and staff very friendly, amazing breakfast spread, really enjoyed our stay, would recommend this hotel.

title: Fabulous pool
desc: Come here for the pool - it's on the 19th floor, and has amazing views across Singapore, including Marina Bay. The hotel itself is slick, and the staff are friendly. Breakfast is good (though the choice is a bit overwhelming- sweet corn ice cream???). But the coffee is undrinkably vile!

title: rooftop pool is the best!
desc: hi people WHO reads this now.i have been here for twice and i loove it its really nice hotel to stay.especially rooftop pooll!!!! this is special ı swear if you arrive singapore try this hotel...best vacations to everyone! instagram @statistchef

title: Amazing pool!
desc: The atmosphere of the entire place was welcoming and amazing! I had the best time here and I can say it's a lot better than atmosphere at marina bay sands! I would definitely recommend people to stay here just for the pool!

title: Good Location
desc: The property is very close to the shopping area . There is a lift direct to orchard gateway mall. Easy to find restaurant and convenience store. close to killiney street that a lot of cafe to find breakfast. The MRT just under the property.

title: Perfect hotel !
desc: When we arrived we got upgraded to our delight to a club room ! Wow we walked in and the room was one of the best we have ever stayed in ! We had floor to ceiling windows with a panoramic view everything was immaculate and spacious . We were on our honeymoon so we got delivered some wine and treats which was a nice touch . The hotel was in a great location easy access to many places we regularly used the MRT underground which was easy to get around. The rooftop pool was lovely amazing views and very relaxing considering your in a city . The breakfast had a vast choice and was lovely . While in Singapore we visited gardens by the bay , marina sands and we did the zip wire and aquarium in santosa which we recommend We really hope we can come back here in the future ! Thanks hotel

title: Location, Location, Location, excellent room and a great rooftop pool
desc: Superb location. Set on Orchard Road, the main shopping street and immediately above Somerset MRT station (you can get there by lift directly from the hotel!). Taxi drop off also really easy on Somerset road. Very friendly reception, very comfortable room of a decent size, with a good view and the rooftop pool is outstanding. Excellent Tourist Information (highly recommended) opposite, on the other side of Orchard Road. Won't bother looking elsewhere next time in Singapore.

title: First class
desc: Could not be faulted, excellent and very helpful staff. The hotel is very clean, room cleanliness is first class. Location is perfect for access to shops, taxis easy to get. We upgraded to breakfast and use of the club lounge which was a bonus. The rooftop pool is stunning and worth a visit especially late at night.

title: Fantastic Hotel
desc: We stayed here for 4 nights from the 6-9th September staying on the 15 Floor with views of the City. The rooms are nice & modern with fridge, tea & coffee & toiletries all supplied. There's also 2 bottles of water everyday put in your room. The breakfast has a wide choice of food to accommodate all cultures. The staff are friendly & helpful and very smart in there uniforms. The roof top pool has good views of the city( see photos). The hotel is situated above the Orchard Gateway and is in a good central area for all shops & restaurants. If I was to come back to Singapore I would defiantly use this hotel again.

title: Perfect location and a comfy little room for a traveler...
desc: The rooms are perfectly clean but quite small compared to standard hotel rooms. The pillows are comfy and different than each other. The bed is a bit hard to sleep without the pillows but interestingly relaxing too. The brand and the products they use for shampoo conditioner and shower gel is quite good, at least better then huge percent of the hotel industry. The best feature was the hotels location which was great because you have your mall and your mrt station downstairs of your room. The mrt is also the station of the red line so the most popular for a traveler. Mall is one of the best if not too. The price for the hotel is well deserved. The only problem may be the service for the extras like adapters and bathroom scale. We requested one adapter and one bathroom scale and

title: Convenient location, comfy room
desc: Check-in was fast and easy, staff is just the right amount of friendly (not overbearing and not overly talkative). Booked via Golden Circle reservation. Rooms are clean, comfy, spacious enough. I particularly liked how soft the towel were, not all hotels i've stayed in SG at this price point (or even higher) has really paid attention to the fluffiness of their towels. Notably, there's no phone that i can borrow (most other hotels have this complimentary facilty) but wifi is good and fast. Breakfast buffet is ok - not crowded, good selection, not overly plenty. Didint like the congee, though. It really looked and tasted like watered rice (not thick unlike the usual congee). I like the complimentary infused water near the lifts - nice touch! And the vending machines at each

title: Staycation
desc: Nice getaway from home. Very good location above shopping mall. Many eateries around. Best part of hotel is the infinity pool on 19th floor, which opens till 11 pm. It is not as crowded as the MBS pool and offers a lovely view of the city. You can see the ionic MBS from here.

title: Convenient location for the Orchard Road
desc: Overall the hotel Jen is located at a very convenient location on the central of Orchard Road. You have the Somerset MRT station so getting about is very easy. Shops are very easy to get to and there are food everywhere. Room is very clean and I love the rooftop pool over looking the MBS hotel. Top location and reasonable hotel price. Lobby is located at Level 10 and you need to take another life down to the ground level. Shower room and the seperate toilet but if you want a privacy there is minimal privacy to change your clothes after you have your shower.

title: Clean and quiet hotel in center of Orchard
desc: Hotel is located in center of Orchard and very good access to MRT station. Front desk is 10F, but desk for guidance is placed on grand floor. The staff was kind. The room was face the other side of Orchard street and quiet and clean. The front receiption staff was well skilled and check in and check out was very smooth without taking time.

title: Poor Customer Service
desc: This is my first time staying here and I decided to send some packages to the hotel. During my stay, I received all of my packages but one which turned out to arrive later than I expected. During my checkout, I told the receptionist that I have one more incoming package and I asked them to keep it for me so I can have someone to come and pick it up a month later. The receptionist said everything will be taken care of and they'll keep it for me. Fast forward one month later, my sister in law came to pick up the package and guess what happened. The hotel decided to send my package back to where it came from!! Nobody even tried to give me the courtesy of calling me or at the very least email me that the package has arrived and at least asked me what to do with it. Nope, none of

title: Excellent Location and beautiful view from Roof Top
desc: Have visited Singapore quite many times for 15 Years. Singapore has been always the kind and clean city with numerous delicious foods and nice hotel. Jen hotel is a pretty new hotel so everything is very clean and easy access to MRT and downtown. But price wise is slightly higher considering hotel grade and the room and space is pretty small.

title: Great staycation!
desc: Stayed for 3 nights less than a week before Christmas . Hotel located above the Orchardgateway shopping mall and MTR station. Enjoyed the rooftop pool and fitness centre. Orchard road decorated with Christmas props and colorful lights and had an unforgettable walk from one end to the other end.

title: Very nice hotel, in central hub of Orchard Road
desc: I stayed here for one week while on business in December. Very nice hotel, well presented and clean rooms, friendly staff, and great buffet breakfast! There is also a lovely rooftop pool with a wonderful view. Very convenient location, adjoining shopping malls, the MRT and of course, the shopping mecca of Orchard Road. Highly recommended!

title: Perfect location
desc: Hotel has nice, youthfull brand, rooms are quite basic (we had superior king), but there is everything you need; nice bed, aircond., fridge, coffee facilities, umbrella. Breakfast is average, selection mostly asian style. If you like to eat bread, cheese old cold cuts, you´ll get dissapointed. MRT station downstairs and beautyfull pool are big bonus.Any way, if I visit Singapore agein, I´ll choose this hotel.

title: Superb Singapore Fling
desc: 5 nights stay and play with family across 3 rooms at hotel Jen Orchard Gateway. What a delight. Great hotel, dining, and lounges and rooftop pool by day or night. Awesome fine dining, shopping and tourist attractions to discover. Everything’s so close a cab ride $6-25 depending where you going. Stay here to play at Sentosa with family (their resort looks tired and has dolphins 🐬😭~ can’t support that) Check out little India for culture and food. Jen had us holidayed and relaxed to head home, everything here was excellent.

title: Location Central, Mall Below
desc: The location is great. I arrived at Changi and boarded the MRT from CG2 station to Somerset. At Somerset station head towards Exit C and thereafter take a very short walk up a very short ramp to Lift Lobby A in Orchardgateway Mall. Hotel lobby is at Level 10. It's a modern hotel, centrally located and food options are ample within Orchardgateway, Orchard Central and across the other side of the road where eateries open till late beyond mall closing hours. I had the city view room, practical in size for 2 persons, clean and all things in good working order. Shower and WC are separate and so is the sink. Bed is large and comfy. Personally for me the best thing was the hairdryer which was 2000W :) Check in was a little haphazard I felt and it took a while. Check out was much

title: Great location a good place to explore from
desc: We had a wonderful 2 night stay including a superb breakfast. The hotel is on top of the Orchard Gateway Shopping Mall and below that Somerset metro. A superb hotel with bright spacious rooms with all the facilities. The large infinity pool is located on the roof terrace on the 19rg floor. There is a bar next to the pool. A lifeguard was on station when we were present. The main restaurant is on the 10th floor and the breakfast buffet was one of most comprehensive food options I have ever seen. You could even have ice cream. All tastes are catered for. I loved the crispy bacon. Great service fantastic staff made it a wonderful stay. Top marks for everything.

title: Weekend Gateway
desc: I tried this hotel since it is the same name as my name. Just for fun. But I found it feels good when you are surrounded by your name. I found it so cute. The hotel itself is well located on top of Sommerset 313. The MRT is underneath. It is so convenient. It is one of recommended hotel.

title: Great Hotel and rooftop bar
desc: Very nice location on Orchard street. In the middle of loads of shopping. We checked in early and our room wasn’t ready. That is not a problem and we left our luggage there.
